tika-s0302t:194_21: Pathavīkasiṇādīsu kammaṃ ārabhatītiādi pāḷiyaṃ samathapubbaṅgamā vipassanā dassitāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:194_30: Abhisaṅkhāramūlako hi khandhasantāno khandhasantāne ca ucchinnasaṃyoge khīṇāsavasamaññāti.
tika-s0302t:197_4: Tena avassambhāvini bhūte viya upacāro hotīti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:197_6: Atippagoyeva nikkhantadivasoti pakatiyā bhikkhācaraṇavelāya ativiya pāto eva vihārato nikkhantadivasabhāgo.
tika-s0302t:197_8: Dakkhiṇadvārassāti rājagahanagare dakkhiṇadvārassa veḷuvanassa ca antarā ahosi,
tika-s0302t:197_10: Kiṃ vādīti catūsu vādesu kataraṃ vādaṃ vadasi.
tika-s0302t:197_12: Kiṃ vadatīti pana cattāro vāde sāmaññato gahetvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vadati yathā kiṃ te jātaliṅgaṃ.
tika-s0302t:198_11: tathā avabhāsanato cetasi upaṭṭhānato gambhīrāvabhāsañca karonto.
tika-s0302t:201_2: Vuttanayeneva veditabbanti padatthe tato visiṭṭhaṃ aniddisitvā itaraṃ atthato vibhāvetuṃ “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:201_4: atha kho phassassa sahakārīkāraṇabhūtaaññapaccayā ca uppajjatīti.
tika-s0302t:201_7: Sā hi kāmaṃ paṭṭhāne āgatesu catuvīsatiyā paccayesu kenaci paccayena cetanāya paccayo na hoti.
tika-s0302t:201_8: Yasmā pana kāye sati eva kāyakammaṃ nāma hoti, nāsati,
tika-s0302t:201_9: tasmā sā tassā sāmaggiyabhāvena icchitabbāti vuttaṃ “kāyenapi kariyamānaṃ karīyatī”ti.
tika-s0302t:201_11: sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṃ sukhaṃ dukkha”nti.
tika-s0302t:201_23: Uddhaccasahagatacetanā pavattiyaṃ vipākaṃ detiyevāti “vīsati cetanā labbhantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:201_24: Tathā vacīdvāreti ettha “kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhantī”ti idaṃ tathā-
tika-s0302t:201_28: Tāpi cetanāti yathāvuttā ekūnavīsati cetanā avijjāpaccayā honti kusalānampi pageva itarādhiṭṭhahitāvijjasseva uppajjanato,
tika-s0302t:201_32: Parehi kāriyamānoti parehi ussāhito hutvā kayiramāno.
tika-s0302t:201_34: Kammameva jānantoti tadā attanā kariyamānakammameva jānanto.
tika-s0302t:202_0: Catūsūti “sāmaṃ vā pare vā sampajāno vā asampajāno vā”ti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0302t:202_6: So kāyo na hotīti ettha pasādakāyopi gahetabbo.
tika-s0302t:202_8: So kāyo na hotīti so kāyo paccayanirodhena na hoti.
tika-s0302t:203_1: Khettaṃ na hotīti tassa dukkhassa aviruhanaṭṭhānattā.
tika-s0302t:203_8: nayidha jeṭṭhalakkhaṇaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ nippayojakassa sukhassa dukkhassa ca adhippetattā.
tika-s0302t:209_6: te cassa attano phalassa paccayā na honti.
tika-s0302t:209_16: Dhammasotaṃ samāpannoti ariyadhammasotaṃ sammadeva āpanno patto.
tika-s0302t:209_19: sadevakena ca lokena “saraṇa”nti akaraṇīyato ariyapakkhaṃ bhajanto puthujjanabhūmiṃ atikkanto.
tika-s0302t:212_2: vineyyajjhāsayavasena hi idaṃ suttaṃ satthārā aññasmiṃ āsane desitaṃ,
tika-s0302t:212_3: parisāya vivaṭṭena sātthikāti satthu desanā āgatāti ayaṃ paṭiggāhakādhīnā hotīti dhammagāravena saṅgahaṃ āropentiyeva.
tika-s0302t:215_0: 29. Akkharabhāṇakānanti akkhararucīnaṃ. Upasaggena padavaḍḍhanampi ruccanti. Tenāha “te hī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:223_3: saṅkhātā pariññātā dhammā yesaṃ te saṅkhātadhammā,
tika-s0302t:223_5: Sekkhā pana vipākassa apariññātattā “saṅkhātadhammā”ti na vuccanti.
tika-s0302t:223_7: Te pana kāmaṃ puggalapaṭilābhavasena anekasahassāva honti,
tika-s0302t:223_8: catumaggaheṭṭhimaphalattayassa pana vasena taṃsamaṅgitāsāmaññena na sattajanato uddhanti āha “satta jane”ti niyametvā viseseti.
tika-s0302t:223_10: tato vā attānaṃ viya vineyyalokaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti nipako,
tika-s0302t:224_0: “Ko nu kho imassa pañhassa attho”ti cintento pañhāya kaṅkhati nāma.
tika-s0302t:224_1: “Kathaṃ byākaramāno nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ na virodhemī”ti cintento ajjhāsayaṃ kaṅkhati nāma.
tika-s0302t:224_4: Pahīnavicikiccho hi mahāthero āyasmato assajimahātherassa santikeyeva,
tika-s0302t:224_7: Dhammasenāpatibhāvena vā mama pattadhammadesanāvāraṃ ādāya carantoti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:225_4: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sammappaññāya passato”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “passantassā”ti attho vutto.
tika-s0302t:225_6: paṭipanno hotī”ti imāya pāḷiyā na sameti,
tika-s0302t:225_8: Yāva arahattamaggā nibbidādīnaṃ atthāyāti samitāpekkhadhammavasā padaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0302t:225_10: Sekkhapaṭipadā kathitā “nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0302t:225_13: virāgā nirodhāti karaṇe nissakkavacananti āha “sabbāni kāraṇavacanānī”ti.
tika-s0302t:228_2: Nivattoti pubbe vaṭṭasotassa paṭisotaṃ gantuṃ āraddho,
tika-s0302t:228_4: tato nivatto pariklesavidhame asaṃsaṭṭho viyutto hoti.
tika-s0302t:228_7: tattha ca nirapekkhatā tatiyamaggādhigamenāti dassento “tayo magge”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:228_9: tasmā tassa taṃ uparimakoṭiyā assāso vutto.
tika-s0302t:229_0: Na evaṃ byākatāti “khīṇā jātī”tiādikā evaṃ uttānakaṃ na byākatā,
tika-s0302t:230_0: Tassa paccayassa khayāti tassa kammabhavasaṅkhātassa paccayassa avijjāya sahakāritāyaṃ saṅgahitassa khayā anuppādā nirodhā.
tika-s0302t:230_5: Ājānāti catusaccaṃ heṭṭhimamaggehi ñātaṃ anatikkamitvāva paṭivijjhatīti aññā aggamaggo.
tika-s0302t:232_0: Ayamassa visayoti ayaṃ vedanā assa sāriputtattherassa savisayo tattha visayabhāvena pavattattā.
tika-s0302t:232_1: Kiñcāpīti kiñcāpi sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā dukkhā vedanā vipariṇāmasukhā,
tika-s0302t:232_3: Vipariṇāmakoṭiyāti aniccabhāvena sabbāva vedanā dukkhā nāma.
tika-s0302t:232_4: Sukhapaṭikkhepatopi hi sukhapītiyā pharaṇatāya sukhāti tikkhamattena vipariṇāmadukkhāti vipariṇāmato abhāvādhigamena sukhanirodhakkhaṇamattena.
tika-s0302t:232_5: Tathā hi vuttaṃ papañcasūdaniyaṃ “sukhāya vedanāya atthibhāvo sukha”nti.
tika-s0302t:232_11: Dukkhavedanuparamo hi vuttānaṃ sukhato upaṭṭhāti evāti vadanti.
tika-s0302t:232_12: Tassa yogassa vūpasamena “aho sukhaṃ jāta”nti majjhattavedanāya jānanabhāvo yāthāvato avabujjhanaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:232_13: Adukkhamasukhāpi vedanā vijānantassa sukhaṃ hoti tassa sukhumatāya viññeyyabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:232_14: Yathā rūpārūpadhammānaṃ salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca sammadeva avabodho paramaṃ sukhaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0302t:235_2: Ñāṇasampayuttā hi ñāṇūpanissayā adukkhamasukhā vedanā pasatthākārā,
tika-s0302t:235_3: yato sā iṭṭhā ceva iṭṭhaphalā cāti.
tika-s0302t:236_0: Vedanāparicchedajānaneti “tisso imā vedanā”ti evaṃ paricchedato jānane.
tika-s0302t:236_4: Yathāpaṭividdhā hi vedanā idha therena desitāti.
tika-s0302t:236_5: Iminā kāraṇenāti “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti vedanānaṃ aniccatāya dukkhabhāvajānanasaṅkhātena kāraṇena.
tika-s0302t:236_6: Taṃnimittaṃ hissa vedanāsu taṇhā na uppajjati.
tika-s0302t:236_11: Taṇhā na tiṭṭhatīti na santiṭṭhati nappavattati.
tika-s0302t:237_1: Hetumhi cetaṃ nissakkavacananti hetuatthena karaṇavacanena atthamāha “katarena vimokkhenā”ti.
tika-s0302t:237_2: Karaṇatthepi vā etaṃ nissakkavacananti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:238_2: kāmupādānaṃ pana aggamaggenāti tassa vasena “sabbupādānakkhayā”ti vadanto thero attano arahattapattiṃ byākaroti.
tika-s0302t:238_5: Cakkhuto rūpe savantīti cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyaṃ tadanugatamanoviññāṇavīthiyañca rūpārammaṇā āsavā pavattantīti.
tika-s0302t:238_7: kāmāsavādayo eva vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena sandanti,
tika-s0302t:238_14: Na hi seyyamānādippahānena vinā hīnamānaṃyeva pajahati.
tika-s0302t:240_2: Puggalathomanatthanti desanākusalānaṃ ānandattherādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ pasaṃsanatthaṃ ukkaṃsanatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t:241_4: Evaṃ cintesīti evaṃ vakkhamānena dhammadāyādadesanāya cintitākārena cintesi.
tika-s0302t:241_8: Ayaṃ desanā aggāti bhagavā dhammasenāpatiṃ guṇato evaṃ paggaṇhātīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:242_0: Pakāsetvāti guṇato pākaṭaṃ paññātaṃ katvā sabbasāvakehi seṭṭhabhāve ṭhapetukāmo.
tika-s0302t:242_1: Cittagatiyā cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti kāyasamānagatikattādhiṭṭhānena.
tika-s0302t:242_2: Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattena cittena samānagatiko hotīti?
tika-s0302t:242_4: Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittavipariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t:242_5: Na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0302t:242_6: “idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū”ti panādhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti,
tika-s0302t:242_7: tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0302t:242_8: evaṃ “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū”ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ
tika-s0302t:242_9: viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappati hoti,
tika-s0302t:243_1: Idaṃ nāma atthajātaṃ bhagavā pucchissatīti pubbe mayā aviditaṃ apassaṃ.
tika-s0302t:243_2: Āsayajānanatthanti “evaṃ byākarontena satthu ajjhāsayo gahito hotī”ti evaṃ satthu ajjhāsayajānanatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t:243_3: Dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto bhagavā paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi dutiyaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanteneva paṭhamapañhavissajjanassa sampaṭicchitabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:244_4: sāvakavisaye dhamme dahati yāthāvato ajite katvā ṭhapetīti attho.
tika-s0302t:247_2: Catūsūti catusaccassa bodhanavasena vuttesu catūsu ñāṇesu.
tika-s0302t:247_6: Sabhāvato paccayato cassa pariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃtveva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:247_10: Imassa hi dhammassa adhigamahetu ayaṃ ariyo atītānāgate nayenapi catusaccadhamme abhisambujjhati.
tika-s0302t:247_11: Maggañāṇameva pana atītānāgate nayanasadisaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “maggañāṇadhammena vā”ti dutiyavikappo vutto.
tika-s0302t:248_0: Ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhenāti dhammacakkhubhūtena ñāṇacakkhunā asammohapaṭivedhavasena paccakkhato diṭṭhena.
tika-s0302t:248_2: Yasmā tathā diṭṭhaṃ viditaṃ sabbaso pattaṃ mahāupāyo hoti,
tika-s0302t:248_6: Viditenāti cattāri saccāni viditvā pākaṭāni katvā ṭhitena.
tika-s0302t:248_8: Pattenāti cattāri saccāni patvā ṭhitattā dhammaṃ pattena.
tika-s0302t:248_10: Atītānāgate nayaṃ netīti atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti harati peseti.
tika-s0302t:248_12: satthārā pana maggañāṇaṃ atītānāgate nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ taṃmūlakattā.
tika-s0302t:248_14: tasmā maggañāṇaṃ nayanasadisaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0302t:248_18: Taṃ ākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ye kho kecī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:248_23: na nayanassāti duvidhena ñāṇadhammenāti na na yujjati.
tika-s0302t:248_24: Tathā catusaccadhammassa ñātattā maggaphalasaṅkhātassa vā dhammassa saccapaṭivedhasampayogaṃ gatattā
tika-s0302t:248_25: “nayanaṃ hotū”ti tena “iminā dhammenā”ti ñāṇassa visayabhāvena ñāṇasampayogena tadañātenāti ca attho
tika-s0302t:248_27: Anuayeti dhammañāṇassa anurūpavasena aye bujjhanañāṇe diṭṭhānaṃ adiṭṭhānayanato adiṭṭhassa diṭṭhatāya ñāpanato ca.
tika-s0302t:251_12: sova dhammato añño natthīti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayo.
tika-s0302t:251_19: “Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇa”ntiādinā addhattaye anvayabyatirekavasena pavattiyā chabbidhassa ñāṇassa.
tika-s0302t:251_26: Tasmā idhāpi dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ vipassanāti gahetvā “vipassanāpaṭivipassanā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:254_2: Tattha nisinnassa diṭṭhigatikassa laddhiyā bhindanavasena upari kathetukāmo.
tika-s0302t:254_3: Buddhānañhi desanāvāraṃ pacchindāpetvā pucchituṃ samattho nāma koci natthi.
tika-s0302t:254_15: Tadetaṃ maggena nirodhetabbaṃ vaṭṭaṃ nirujjhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:254_16: “Ayaṃ satto vināsaṃ abhāvaṃ patvā sabbaso ucchijjatī”ti evaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa sambhave saccabhāve sati.
tika-s0302t:255_2: Vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkoti niccassa appavattiṃ pāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0302t:255_3: Micchādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhiṃ vijjhati asamāhitapuggalasevanavasena tathā pavattituṃ appadānavasena ca pajahitabbāpajahanavasena sammādiṭṭhiṃ vijjhati.
tika-s0302t:255_8: Paṇṇapupphaphalapallavānaṃ avatthubhūto tālo eva tālāvatthu “asive sivā”ti vohāro viya.
tika-s0302t:258_2: Jarāmaraṇassa ceva jarāmaraṇasāmikassa ca khaṇavasena yo vadeyya.
tika-s0302t:261_1: Na tumhākanti kāyassa anattaniyabhāvadassanameva panetanti yā tassa anattaniyatā,
tika-s0302t:261_6: Nayidaṃ purāṇakammamevāti “idaṃ kāyo”ti vuttasarīraṃ purāṇakammameva na hoti.
tika-s0302t:261_11: Aññamaññābhimukhehi samecca paccayehi kato abhisaṅkhatoti āha “paccayehi katoti daṭṭhabbo”ti.
tika-s0302t:261_12: Abhisañcetayitanti tathā abhisaṅkhatattasaṅkhātena abhimukhabhāvena cetayitaṃ pakappitaṃ,
tika-s0302t:261_15: Vedaniyanti vedanāya hitaṃ vatthārammaṇabhāvena vedanāya paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:264_3: Tena cetanāya viya pakappānānusayānampi viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā vakkhamānaṃyeva avisiṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇabhāvaṃ joteti.
tika-s0302t:264_5: vattanattho pana cetanādīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ cetayanapakappanānusayanarūpo visiṭṭhaṭṭho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0302t:264_11: akusalesu pana pavatti pākaṭāti “dvādasannaṃ cetanāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:264_12: Sahajātakoṭiyāti idaṃ paccuppannāpi kāmarāgādayo anusayāva vuccanti taṃsadisatāyāti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:264_14: Anāgatā eva hi kāmarāgādayo nippariyāyato “anusayā”ti vattabbataṃ arahanti.
tika-s0302t:264_17: Tasmiṃ paccaye satīti tasmiṃ cetanāpakappanānusayasaññite paccaye sati patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hoti.
tika-s0302t:264_21: Patiṭṭhiteti hi iminā kammassa katabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0302t:264_24: Tattha puretaraṃ uppannāhi kammacetanāhi laddhapaccayattā balappattāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya kammaviññāṇaṃ
tika-s0302t:264_26: Tathā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vipākaṃ dentaṃ anantare jātivasena deti upapajjavedanīyakammanti.
tika-s0302t:265_2: Na jāyamānakkhaṇo appavattanakkhaṇo na kevalaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇo appahīnānusayassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0302t:265_4: Tadidaṃ tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanāsu appavattamānāsu anusayānaṃ sahajātakoṭiādinā pavatti nāma natthi,
tika-s0302t:265_5: vipākādīsu appahīnakoṭiyā pavattati karontassa abhāvatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:266_0: Paṭhamadutiyavārehi vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā tatiyavāre “no ce”tiādinā vivaṭṭaṃ dassitanti “paṭhamapade tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā nivattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:267_1: Ettha cetanāpakappanānaṃ pavattanavasena dhammaparicchedo dassitoti “cetetīti tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā gahitā”tiādinayo idheva hotīti dassito.
tika-s0302t:267_3: Catūsu akusalacetanāsūti yathāvuttāsu eva catūsu akusalacetanāsu,
tika-s0302t:267_4: itarā pana “na pakappetī”ti iminā paṭikkhepena nivattāti.
tika-s0302t:267_5: Sutte āgataṃ vāretvāti “no ca pakappetī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhepavasena sutte āgataṃ vajjetvā.
tika-s0302t:267_6: “Na pakappetī”ti hi iminā aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesu sahajātakoṭiyā pavattaanusayo nivattito tesaṃ cittānaṃ appavattanato,
tika-s0302t:268_4: Etthāti etasmiṃ tatiyavāre arahattamaggassa kiccaṃ kathitaṃ sabbaso anusayanibbattibhedanato.
tika-s0302t:268_5: Khīṇāsavassa kiccakaraṇantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati sabbaso vedanādīnaṃ paṭikkhepabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:268_6: Nava lokuttaradhammātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyā anusayasamugghāṭanato maggānantarāni phalāni,
tika-s0302t:268_9: Punabbhavasīsena anantarabhavasaṅgahitaṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇameva vā gahitanti āha “punabbhavassa ca antare eko sandhī”ti.
tika-s0302t:268_10: Bhavajātīnanti ettha “dutiyabhavassa tatiyabhave jātiyā”ti evaṃ paramparavasena gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:268_11: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattigahaṇena pana nānantariyato kammabhavo gahito,
tika-s0302t:268_16: atha kho anusetī”ti evaṃ bhagavatā dutiyanaye pubbabhāge bhavanibbattakakusalākusalāyūhanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:268_17: pakappanañca vināpi bhavesu diṭṭhādīnavassa yogino anusayapaccayā vipassanācetanāpi paṭisandhijanakā
tika-s0302t:268_19: tadā vijjamānatebhūmakavipākādidhammesu appahīnakoṭiyā anusayitakilesappaccayā bhavavajjassa kammaviññāṇassa patiṭṭhitatā hotīti dassanatthañca vutto.
tika-s0302t:268_20: “Na ceteti pakappeti anusetī”ti ayaṃ nayo na gahito cetanaṃ vinā pakappanassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:271_1: Viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhīti hetuphalasandhi viññāṇaggahaṇena kammaviññāṇassa gahitattā.
tika-s0302t:274_3: Tasseva bhavattayassa patthanā paṇidhānādivasena nati nāma.
tika-s0302t:274_4: Āgatimhi gatīti paccupaṭṭhānavasena abhimukhaṃ gati pavatti etasmāti āgati,
tika-s0302t:274_6: Tasmiṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa gati pavatti nibbatti hoti.
tika-s0302t:274_14: Ekova sandhīti eko hetuphalasandhi eva kathito.
tika-s0302t:279_10: Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito paṭṭhāya paṭipattiadhigamo sotāpatti,
tika-s0302t:279_11: tadatthāya tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni,
tika-s0302t:279_14: Yaṃ pubbabhāgeti yaṃ sayaṃ sotāpattimaggaphalapaṭilābhato pubbabhāge tadatthāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0302t:279_18: yoniso upāyena aniccādito manasi karaṇaṃ yoniso manasikāro,
tika-s0302t:279_19: ussukkāpentena dhammassa nibbānassa anudhammapaṭipajjanaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipattīti etāni sotāpattiyā aṅgāni.
tika-s0302t:279_20: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sotāpattiaṅganti padaṃ apekkhitvā “evaṃ āgata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:279_22: Sotāpanno aṅgīyati ñāyati etenāti sotāpannassa aṅgantipi vuccati.
tika-s0302t:279_25: Kathaṃ avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ paccayotiādinā kenacipi anupārambhiyattā nirupārambho.
tika-s0302t:279_28: Ubhayampi pana sandhāya ubhayaṃ vuttanti apare.
tika-s0302t:279_32: Sammā upāyattā tassa paṭiccasamuppanne yāthāvato ñāyatīti ñāyo,
tika-s0302t:279_34: Ñāṇaṃ pana ñāyati so etenāti ñāyo.
tika-s0302t:280_5: Paraṃ ayananti ativiya savisaye ayitabbaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:281_2: tadeva bhāyitabbato bhayanti āha “bhayaṃ veranti atthato eka”nti.
tika-s0302t:281_3: Idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma tassa verassa mūlabhūtato verakārapuggalato bahibhāvattā.
tika-s0302t:281_4: Teneva hi tassa verakārapuggalassa uppannaṃ veraṃ sandhāya “idaṃ ajjhattikaveraṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t:281_5: tannissitassa verassa mūlabhūtā verakārapuggalacetanā uppajjati paharituṃ asamatthassapīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:281_6: Na hi nerayikā nirayapālesu paṭipaharituṃ sakkonti.
tika-s0302t:281_7: Nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjatīti etena “atthi niraye nirayapālā”ti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:281_8: Yaṃ panetaṃ bāhiraveranti yamidaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca bāhiraṃ veraṃ.
tika-s0302t:281_9: Puggalaveranti vuttaṃ attakiccaṃ sādhetuṃ asakkonto kevalaṃ parapuggale uppannamattaṃ veranti katvā.
tika-s0302t:284_1: Bhikkhūnaṃ kathitabhāvamattameva visesoti etena yā satthārā ekaccānaṃ desitadesanā,
tika-s0302t:284_2: puna tadaññesaṃ veneyyadamakusalena kālantare teneva desitā,
tika-s0302t:284_3: sā dhammasaṃgāhakehi “mā no satthudesanā sampaṭiggahaṃ vinā nassatū”ti visuṃ saṅgahaṃ āropitāti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:287_5: Āraddhavipassako “imañca imañca paccayasāmaggiṃ paṭicca ime dhammā khaṇe khaṇe uppajjantī”ti passanto
tika-s0302t:287_6: “paccayasamudayaṃ passantopi bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṃ passatī”ti vutto paccayadassanamukhena nibbattikkhaṇassa
tika-s0302t:287_8: So pana khaṇe khaṇe saṅkhārānaṃ nibbattiṃ passituṃ āraddho “imehi nāma paccayehi nibbattatī”ti passati.
tika-s0302t:287_10: Yasmā pana paccayato saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passanto khaṇato tesaṃ udayadassanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0302t:287_11: khaṇato etesaṃ udayaṃ passato pageva paccayānaṃ suggahitattā paccayato dassanaṃ sukhena ijjhati,
tika-s0302t:287_16: Tadubhayaṃ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena passanto aññatarassa dassane itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti,
tika-s0302t:287_17: pubbabhāge ca ārammaṇavasena khayato vayasammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṃ passanto atirekavasena anussavādito accantaṃ atthaṅgamaṃ passati.
tika-s0302t:287_21: Samudayatthaṅgamaṃ nibbattibhedanti samudayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbattiṃ atthaṅgamasaṅkhātaṃ bhedañca.
tika-s0302t:287_26: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti “cakkhu rūpāni viññāṇa”nti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati samāgame nibbatti phassoti vuttoti āha “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso”ti.
tika-s0302t:293_1: Aññamaññaṃ dvinnaṃ ñātīnaṃ gāmo ñātikoti vuttoti āha “dvinnaṃ ñātakānaṃ gāme”ti.
tika-s0302t:293_4: So kira āvāso yathā sudhāparikammena payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0302t:293_5: evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā chādetvā kato.
tika-s0302t:293_6: Tādisañhi chadanaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā iṭṭhakāchadanaṃ anuññātaṃ.
tika-s0302t:293_9: Pariyāyati attano phalaṃ pariggahetvā vattatīti pariyāyo,
tika-s0302t:293_12: Upecca suyyati etthāti upassutīti vuttaṃ “upassutīti upassutiṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0302t:293_16: Evaṃ mahatthañhi vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā suṇantassa mahato atthāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0302t:293_18: Tīsu hi bhavesu saṅkhāragataṃ paccayuppannavasena manasikaroto bhagavato kiñci asesetvā sabbampi taṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ upagacchi.
tika-s0302t:293_20: Tantivasena tamatthaṃ vācāya nicchārento “vacasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto”ti vutto.
tika-s0302t:293_21: Paccayapaccayuppannavasena ca atthaṃ āharitvā tesaṃ nirodhena vivaṭṭassa āhatattā “yathānusandhinā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:294_0: Manasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto “tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto”ti vutto.
tika-s0302t:294_6: Ādhārappattanti ādhāraṃ cittasantānappattaṃ appamuṭṭhaṃ gatattā ādhārappattaṃ nāma.
tika-s0302t:297_0: 46. Nāmavasenāti gottanāmavasena ca kittivasena ca apākaṭo, tasmā “jātivasena brāhmaṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:303_1: Āyatiṃ hitaṃ tena loko na yatati na īhatīti lokāyataṃ.
tika-s0302t:303_2: Na hi taṃ laddhiṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi uppādenti,
tika-s0302t:303_8: Ittarabhāvena lakuṇḍakabhāvena tassa vipulādibhāvena bālānaṃ upaṭṭhānamattanti dassento “āyataṃ mahanta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:303_13: Pacchā na hotīti pacchā kiñci na hoti sabbaso samucchijjanato.
tika-s0302t:303_16: Tathā ceva gahaṇena dvepi vādā sassatadiṭṭhiyo honti.
tika-s0302t:303_19: ekarūpaṃ na hotīti vā gahaṇena dvepi vādā ucchedadiṭṭhiyoti.
tika-s0302t:306_1: Saṃsayuppatti ākāradassananti “kasmiṃ sati kiṃ hotī”ti kāraṇassa phalassa ca paccāmasanena vinā kevalaṃ
tika-s0302t:309_1: Dvepi nayā ekato vuttāti idaṃ “viññāṇe sati nāmarūpaṃ hotī”tiādinā navame vuttassa nayassa “avijjāya
tika-s0302t:309_2: sati saṅkhārā hontī”tiādinā dasame vuttanaye antogadhattā.
tika-s0302t:314_5: Na hi sabbadukkhaparivīmaṃsaṃ vinā sammā dukkhakkhayo sambhavati.
tika-s0302t:314_8: Yasmā jarāmaraṇe gahite sati jātipi gahitā hoti,
tika-s0302t:314_11: Evaṃ yāva jātidhammo jarāmaraṇe gahite gahitova hoti,
tika-s0302t:314_12: jarāmaraṇapadesena tabbikāravanto sabbe tebhūmakā saṅkhārā gahitāti evampi jarāmaraṇaggahaṇena sabbampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0302t:314_19: Nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viyāti bālānaṃ attabhāvassa subhākārena upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0302t:315_3: Paṭipannoti paṭimukho abhisaṅkhāramukho hutvā panno adhigato.
tika-s0302t:315_7: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “pajānātī”ti pubbabhāgavasena pajānanā vuttā,
tika-s0302t:316_1: “so sukhañca vedanaṃ vedayatī”tiādinā satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā sabbathāva vaṭṭadesanāto nivattetabbā siyā.
tika-s0302t:316_4: tena evamādikaṃ idaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭakathanaṃ puna gaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t:316_5: Puggalasaddo itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ pakatīnaṃ vācakoti tato visesetvā gahaṇe paṭhamapakatimeva dassento “purisapuggalo”ti
tika-s0302t:316_14: yasmiṃ bhinne buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsamaññā,
tika-s0302t:316_17: Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-s0302t:316_18: Tattha rūpādidhammaṃ samūhasantānavasena pavattamānaṃ upādāya “satto”tiādi vohāroti āha “satto naro…pe…
tika-s0302t:316_25: sammuti hi saṅketo khandhaṭṭho rāsaṭṭho vā koṭṭhāsaṭṭho vāti?
tika-s0302t:316_27: ayaṃ pana khandhasamaññā phassādīsu tajjāpaññatti viya paramatthasannissayā tassa āsannatarā puggalasamaññādayo
tika-s0302t:316_29: Khandhasīsena vā tadupādānā sabhāvadhammā eva gahitā.
tika-s0302t:316_30: Nanu ca sabbepi sabhāvadhammā sammutimukheneva desanaṃ ārohanti,
tika-s0302t:316_31: na sammukhenāti sabbāpi desanā sammutidesanāva siyāti?
tika-s0302t:316_33: na ca saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti.
tika-s0302t:317_5: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sammutikathāya saccatāti āha “lokasammutikāraṇa”nti lokasamaññaṃ nissāya pavattanato.
tika-s0302t:317_6: Lokasamaññāya hi abhinivesanaṃ vinā paññāpanā ekaccassa sutassa sāvanā viya,
tika-s0302t:318_1: Attano santānassa punanato pujjabhavaphalassa abhisaṅkharaṇato puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ.
tika-s0302t:318_4: Puññaphalampi hi uttarapadalopena “puñña”nti vuccati “evamidaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0302t:318_5: “Apuññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti idaṃ “puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti ettha vuttanayamevāti na uddhataṃ.
tika-s0302t:318_7: Saṅkhāranti saṅkhārassa gahitattā “avijjāgatoya”nti iminā saṅkhārassa paccayo gahito,
tika-s0302t:318_9: Tasmiñca gahite nāmarūpādi sabbaṃ gahitameva hoti.
tika-s0302t:319_1: Tassā hi uppādā sabbaso avijjā pahīnā hoti.
tika-s0302t:319_8: Na taṇhāyati na bhāyati taṇhāvuttino abhāvā,
tika-s0302t:320_0: Gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvāti gilitvā viya aññassa avisayaṃ viya karaṇena pariniṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-s0302t:320_2: sukhābhinandassa dukkhahetubhāvato ca sukhaṃ abhinandantoyeva dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma aggisantāpasukhaṃ icchanto dhūmadukkhānuññāto viya.
tika-s0302t:320_3: Dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanatoti ettha dubbalagahaṇikādayo nidassanabhāvena veditabbā.
tika-s0302t:320_4: Te hi yāva sāyanhasamayāpi abhutvā sāyamāsādīni karonto jighacchādiṃ uppādetvā bhuñjanādīni karonti.
tika-s0302t:320_5: Sukhassa vipariṇāmadukkhato sukhaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:320_6: Keci pana dukkhassa abhāvato vipariṇāmasukhato taṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto dukkhaṃ abhinandatīti vadanti. Taṃ na,
tika-s0302t:320_7: na hi tādisaṃ sukhanimittaṃ koci dukkhaṃ abhinandanto diṭṭho,
tika-s0302t:320_8: dukkhahetuṃ pana sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto diṭṭho.
tika-s0302t:320_9: Dukkhahetuṃ sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ abhinandanto atthato dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāmāti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0302t:321_0: Pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhatīti ekasmiṃ attabhāve manodvārikavedanāto pacchā uppajjitvā tato paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-s0302t:321_1: tato eva siddhamatthaṃ sarūpeneva dassetuṃ “manodvārikavedanā paṭhamaṃ uppajjitvā pacchā nirujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:321_2: Idāni tameva saṅkhepena vuttaṃ vivarituṃ “sā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:321_5: tāva ṭhitā hotīti vuḍḍhihāniyo anupagantvā sarūpeneva ṭhitā hoti.
tika-s0302t:321_10: Hadayakoṭiṃyevāti cakkhādivatthūsu avattetvā tesaṃ khīṇattā koṭibhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃyeva.
tika-s0302t:323_1: Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāyāti imaṃ yathāvuttaṃ pariyosānappattaṃ manodvārikavedanaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0302t:324_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana jīvitapariyādānā uddhanti paduddhāro kato.
tika-s0302t:325_5: Avigatavūpasamaṃ saṅkharitaṃ kumbhaṃ uddharitvā ṭhapento chārikāya sati pidhānavasena ṭhapeti.
tika-s0302t:325_14: tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:325_16: evaṃ āraddhavipassakopesa bhavattayaṃ rāgādīhi ādittanti āha “kumbhakāro viya yogāvacaro”ti.
tika-s0302t:325_18: Samo bhūmibhāgo viya nibbānatalaṃ sabbavisamā nivattanato.
tika-s0302t:326_6: dhammatārūpato”ti imehi sattahi ākārehi sammasanto rūpasattakaṃ vipassati nāma.
tika-s0302t:326_12: nikantipariyādānato”ti imehi sattahi ākārehi sammasanto arūpasattakaṃ vipassati nāma,
tika-s0302t:326_13: tasmā yathāvuttaṃ imaṃ rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca nīharitvā vipassantassa.
tika-s0302t:326_16: tāva tasmimpi sugatibhave ṭhitoyevāti vattabbataṃ labbhatīti “catūhi apāyehi attabhāvaṃ uddharitvā”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:326_18: Tathā ca vakkhati “anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa vaṭṭavūpasamo veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0302t:326_21: Abhisaṅkhārahetuto hettha pariḷāhavūpasamassa upasamabhāvena adhippetattā uṇhakumbhanibbānanidassanampi na virujjhati.
tika-s0302t:326_26: Anuyogāropanatthanti kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno khīṇāsavo api nu puññābhisaṅkhārādikammaṃ kareyyāti pañhaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-s0302t:326_27: Atha vā anuyogāropanatthanti “api nu kho khīṇāsavo bhikkhu puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ vā abhisaṅkhareyyā”tiādinā anuyogaṃ āropetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0302t:327_0: Paṭisandhiviññāṇe siddhe tasmiṃ bhave uppajjanārahānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ siyā sambhavo,
tika-s0302t:327_2: Sabbaso saṅkhāresu asantesu paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ api nu kho paññāyeyya.
tika-s0302t:327_3: Tasmiñhi apaññāyamāne sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ na paññāyeyya.
tika-s0302t:327_7: saddena viññāṇe asati nāmarūpassa appaññāṇanti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t:330_5: Tadāhāroti soḷasa vā vīsaṃ tiṃsaṃ cattālīsaṃ paññāsaṃ vā āhāro paccayo etassāti tadāhāro.
tika-s0302t:330_6: Aggikkhandho viya tayo bhavā ekādasahi aggīhi ādittabhāvato etadeva bhavattayaṃ. Aggi…pe…
tika-s0302t:334_1: Mahantavaṭṭappabandhaopammabhāvena telapadīpassa āhatattā “mahantañca vaṭṭikapālaṃ gahetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:334_3: Tathā vinetabbānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena hi imesaṃ suttānaṃ evaṃ vacanaṃ evaṃ desanā.
tika-s0302t:337_1: Ojaṃ abhiharantīti rasaharaṇiyo viya purisassa sarīre rukkhamūlāni rukkhassa pathavīāporase upari āropenti.
tika-s0302t:338_1: Vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nāsetukāmassa daḷhaṃ uppannasaṃvegañāṇaṃ sandhāya “kuddālo viyā”ti āha.
tika-s0302t:338_2: Tato nibbattitañāṇaṃ samādhipacchiyā ṭhitaṃ nissāya pavattetabbavipassanārambhañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:338_3: Rukkhacchedanapharasu viyāti evaṃbhūtassa vipassanā ekantato vaṭṭacchedāya hotiyevāti āha “rukkhassa…pe…
tika-s0302t:338_13: Sattasu sappāyesu yassa alabhantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vibhūtaṃ hutvā na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0302t:341_2: Tathā karonto yasmā ca tattha tiṇagacchādīnaṃ mūlasantānaggahaṇena taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodheti nāma,
tika-s0302t:341_8: Vuttanayenevāti “rukkhaṃ nāsetukāmo puriso viyā”tiādinā pañcamasutte vuttanayena.
tika-s0302t:344_2: tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “kurū”ti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena.
tika-s0302t:344_3: Yattha bhagavato vasanokāsabhūto koci vihāro na hoti,
tika-s0302t:344_4: tattha kevalaṃ gocaragāmakittanaṃ nidānakathāya pakati yathā “sakkesu viharati devadahaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo”ti.
tika-s0302t:344_5: “Āyasmā”ti vā “devānaṃ piyo”ti vā bhavanti vā piyasamudāhāro esoti āha “āyasmāti piyavacanameta”nti.
tika-s0302t:344_7: Atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ atisammukhā atipacchato uparivāto unnatappadesoti ime cha nisajjadosā.
tika-s0302t:345_1: Sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya bhikkhāpaṭiggaṇhanena tesaṃ abhivādanādisampaṭicchanena ca puññābhisandassa jananena.
tika-s0302t:345_2: Paṭisammajjitvāti antevāsikehi sammaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sakkaccakāritāya puna sammajjitvā.
tika-s0302t:345_3: Ubhayantato paṭṭhāya majjhanti ādito paṭṭhāya vedanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:345_4: jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya ca vedanaṃ pāpetvā sammasanamāha.
tika-s0302t:345_5: Tikkhattunti “ādito paṭṭhāya anta”ntiādinā vuttacaturākārupasaṃhite tayo vāre.
tika-s0302t:345_7: Amhākaṃ bhagavatā gambhīrabhāveneva kathitattā sesabuddhehipi evameva kathitoti dhammanvaye ṭhatvā vuttaṃ “sabbabuddhehi…pe…
tika-s0302t:346_9: tasmā aññattha labbhamānaṃ cātukoṭikaṃ byatirekamukhena nidassetvā tamevassa ekantagambhīrataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “ekaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:346_10: Etaṃ natthīti agambhīro agambhīrāvabhāso cāti etaṃ dvayaṃ natthi.
tika-s0302t:346_11: Tena yathādassite cātukoṭike pacchimā ekakoṭi labbhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:347_2: Yathā bhavaggaggahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahetuṃ na sakkā dūrabhāvato,
tika-s0302t:347_3: evaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ avijjādipaccayasambhūtasamudāgatattho pakatiñāṇena gahetuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0302t:347_4: Yathā sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ pabbatarasaṃ pākatikapurisena nīharituṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0302t:347_5: evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādagate dhammatthādike pakatiñāṇena bhinditvā vibhajja paṭivijjhanavasena jānituṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0302t:347_6: Yathā mahāsamuddaṃ pakatipurisassa bāhudvayavasena pāraṃ tarituṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0302t:347_7: Evaṃ vepullaṭṭhena mahāsamuddasadisaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ pakatiñāṇena desanāvasena pariharituṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0302t:347_8: Yathā pathaviṃ parivattetvā pākatikapurisassa pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0302t:347_9: evaṃ itthaṃ avijjādayo saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccayā hontīti tesaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasabhāvo pākatikañāṇena nīharitvā gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0302t:347_11: Pākatikañāṇavasena cāyamatthayojanā katā diṭṭhasaccānaṃ tattha paṭivedhasabbhāvato,
tika-s0302t:347_12: tathāpi yasmā sāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca tattha sappadesameva ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t:348_1: Svāyaṃ “uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttoti āha “mā bhaṇīti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t:349_0: Tatthāti therassa satipi uttānabhāve paṭiccasamuppādassa aññesaṃ gambhīrabhāve.
tika-s0302t:349_4: Kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhānanti kasmiṃ passe imassa pāsāṇassa garutarapadesoti tassa sallahukabhāvaṃ dīpento vadati.
tika-s0302t:350_2: Pakkuthatīti pakkuthantaṃ viya parivattati parito vattati.
tika-s0302t:352_0: Kaniṭṭhabhātāti vemātikabhātā kaniṭṭho yathā amhākaṃ bhagavato nandatthero.
tika-s0302t:352_1: Buddhānañhi sahodarā bhātaro nāma na honti.
tika-s0302t:353_0: Dve sāṭake nivāsetvāti sāṭakadvayameva attano kāyaparihāriyaṃ katvā,
tika-s0302t:354_0: Pattaggahaṇatthanti antopakkhittauṇhabhojanattā pattassa aparāparaṃ hatthe parivattentassa sukhena pattaggahaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t:354_2: Etāni pākaṭaṭṭhānānīti etāni yathāvuttāni bhagavato desanāya pākaṭāni buddhe buddhasāvake ca uddissa therassa puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni,
tika-s0302t:354_3: paccekabuddhaṃ pana bodhisattañca uddissa therassa puññakaraṇaṭṭhānāni bahūniyeva.
tika-s0302t:355_0: Paṭisandhiṃ gahetvāti amhākaṃ bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivaseyeva paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0302t:356_3: dhāraṇaṃ pāḷiyā pāḷiatthassa ca citte ṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:356_9: Nāmarūpaparicchedoti saha paccayena nāmarūpassa paricchijja avabodho.
tika-s0302t:356_10: Catūhīti dhammagambhīrādīhi catūhi gambhīratāhi sabbāpi gambhīratā.
tika-s0302t:357_0: Sāvakehi desitā desanāpi pana satthu eva desanāti āha “mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā”ti.
tika-s0302t:357_1: “Sekkhena nāma nibbānaṃ sabbākārena paṭividdhaṃ na hotī”ti na tassa gambhīratāti tassa gambhīrassa upādānassa gambhīratā viya suṭṭhu diṭṭhā nāma hoti.
tika-s0302t:357_4: Nibbānañhi sabbepi asekkhā sabbaso paṭivijjhanti nippadesattā,
tika-s0302t:357_5: paccayākāraṃ pana sammāsambuddhāyeva anavasesato paṭivijjhanti, na itare.
tika-s0302t:357_6: Tasmā paccayavasena “idaṃ aparaddha”nti vuttaṃ theraṃ apasādentena.
tika-s0302t:357_7: Tameva hissa anavasesato paṭivedhābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “atha kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:357_8: Asatipi dhammato bhede saṃyojanatthaanusayatthavasena pana tesaṃ labbhamānabhedaṃ gahetvā “ime cattāro kilese”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:357_12: Iti imesaṃ kilesānaṃ appahīnattā tathārūpaṃ upanissayasampadaṃ abhāvayatova anuttānameva dhammaṃ uttānanti na vattabbamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:357_13: Cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyānīti idaṃ mahābodhisattānaṃ santāne bodhiparipācakadhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvasiddhakālavisesadassanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:357_17: Sabbathā paccayākārapaṭivedho nāma sammāsambodhiyādhigamo evāti vuttaṃ “paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantassevā”ti.
tika-s0302t:358_0: “Avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ uppādaṭṭhiti ca pavattaṭṭhiti ca nimittaṭṭhiti ca āyūhanaṭṭhiti ca saṃyogaṭṭhiti ca
tika-s0302t:358_1: palibodhaṭṭhiti ca samudayaṭṭhiti ca hetuṭṭhiti ca paccayaṭṭhiti ca,
tika-s0302t:359_3: Sati ca avijjāya saṅkhārā uppajjanti, nāsati,
tika-s0302t:359_5: Tathā avijjāya sati saṅkhārā pavattanti ca nimiyanti ca.
tika-s0302t:359_8: tathā āyūhanti phaluppattiyā ghaṭenti saṃyujjanti attano phalena.
tika-s0302t:359_12: Paṭicca avijjaṃ saṅkhārā ayanti pavattantīti evaṃ avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ kāraṇabhāvūpagamanavisesā uppādādayo veditabbāti.
tika-s0302t:359_13: Uppādaṭṭhitīti ca tiṭṭhati etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:359_16: Idañca paccayākāradassanaṃ yathā purimehi mahābodhimūle pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0302t:359_17: tathā amhākaṃ bhagavatāpi pavattitanti acchariyavegābhihatā dasasahassilokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampīti dassento “diṭṭhamatte”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:360_1: So pana yasmā atthato hetuppabhavānaṃ hetu.
tika-s0302t:360_4: Nāmarūpaparicchedo tassa ca paccayapariggaho na paṭhamābhinivesamattena hoti,
tika-s0302t:360_5: atha kho tattha aparāparaṃ ñāṇuppattisaññitena anu anu bujjhanena.
tika-s0302t:360_7: Niccasaññādīnaṃ pajahanavasena pavattamānā vipassanādhamme paṭivijjhati eva nāma hoti paṭipakkhavikkhambhanena tikkhavisadabhāvāpattito,
tika-s0302t:360_8: tadadhiṭṭhānabhūtā ca tīraṇapariññā ariyamaggo ca pariññāpahānābhisamayavasena pavattiyā tīraṇappahānapariññāsaṅgaho
tika-s0302t:360_10: Tantaṃ vuccati paṭavīnanatthaṃ tantavāyeti tantaṃ āvañchitvā pasāritasuttavaṭṭitaṃ nīyatīti katvā,
tika-s0302t:360_11: taṃ pana tantākulatāya nidassanabhāvena ākulameva gahitanti āha “tantaṃ viya ākulajātā”ti.
tika-s0302t:360_12: Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:360_17: Majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ anupagantvā antadvayapakkhandena paccayākāre khalitvā ākulabyākulā honti,
tika-s0302t:360_18: teneva antadvayapakkhandena taṃtaṃdiṭṭhiggāhavasena paribbhamantā ujukaṃ dhammaṭṭhititantaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na jānanti.
tika-s0302t:360_23: Tattha tattha guḷakajātanti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne jātaguḷakaṃ piṇḍisuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:360_25: Paccayesu pakkhalitvāti aniccadukkhānattādisabhāvesu paccayadhammesu niccādibhāvavasena pakkhalitvā.
tika-s0302t:360_26: Paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontoti tasseva niccādigāhassa avissajjanato paccayadhammanimittaṃ attano dassanaṃ
tika-s0302t:360_27: ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkonto idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthavasena gaṇṭhikajātā hontīti āha “dvāsaṭṭhi…pe…
tika-s0302t:361_0: Ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatadiṭṭhiādi diṭṭhiyo nissitā allīnā,
tika-s0302t:361_1: vinanato kulāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmassa tantavāyassa gaṇṭhikaṃ nāma ākulabhāvena aggato vā mūlato
tika-s0302t:361_2: vā duviññeyyāvayavaṃ khalitabandhasuttanti āha “kulāgaṇṭhikaṃ vuccati pesakārakañjiyasutta”nti.
tika-s0302t:361_5: Tañhi sā kulāvakaṃ tato tato tiṇahīrādike ānetvā tathā tathā vinandhati,
tika-s0302t:361_6: yathā tesaṃ pesakārakañjiyasuttaṃ viya aggena vā aggaṃ,
tika-s0302t:361_7: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ vivecetuṃ vā na sakkā.
tika-s0302t:362_0: Kāmaṃ muñjapabbajatiṇāni yathājātānipi dīghabhāvena patitvā araññaṭṭhāne aññamaññaṃ vinandhitvā ākulāni hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0302t:362_1: tāni pana tathā dubbiveciyāni yathā rajjubhūtānīti dassetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:363_3: Sukhasamussayatoti “abbhudayato vinipatitattā”ti virūpaṃ nipatitattā yathā tenattabhāvena sukhasamussayo na hoti,
tika-s0302t:363_5: Itaroti saṃsāro nanu “apāya”ntiādinā vuttopi saṃsāro evāti?
tika-s0302t:363_7: nirayādīnaṃ pana adhimattadukkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ apāyādiggahaṇaṃ gobalibaddañāyena ayamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:363_8: Khandhānañca paṭipāṭīti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparuppatti.
tika-s0302t:364_0: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ “apāya”ntiādinā vuttaṃ sabbaṃ apāyadukkhañceva vaṭṭadukkhañca.
tika-s0302t:364_1: Mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viyāti idaṃ paribbhamanaṭṭhānassa mahantabhāvadassanatthañceva paribbhamanassa anavattitadassanatthañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:369_2: upadhāraṇaṃ vā sutaṃ assa atthīti sutavā,
tika-s0302t:369_8: so “sutavā”ti saṃkilesaviddhaṃsanasamattho pariyattidhammaparicayo “taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipatti ca sutavā”ti iminā padena pakāsito.
tika-s0302t:369_9: Atha vā sotabbayuttaṃ sutvā kattabbanipphattiṃ suṇīti sutavā.
tika-s0302t:369_17: kusalehi saha codanāpariharaṇavasena vinicchayassa kāraṇaṃ vinicchayo.
tika-s0302t:369_30: Vimucceyyāti idha pana accantāya vimuccanaṃ adhippetanti āha “muccitukāmo bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:369_31: Catūhi ca rūpajanakapaccayehi āgato cayoti, ācayo, vuddhi.
tika-s0302t:369_36: So hi kaḷevarassa nikkhepoti vuttoti āha “nikkhepananti bhedo”ti.
tika-s0302t:370_2: Ayuttarūpaṃ katvā taṇhādīhi pariggahetuṃ arūpaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ yuttarūpaṃ karoti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:371_12: Parāmasitvāti dhammasabhāvaṃ aniccatādiṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito āmasitvā.
tika-s0302t:371_18: tasmā so tattha nibbindituṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ na samattho.
tika-s0302t:372_3: Idaṃ anusandhivacanaṃ “kasmā āhā”ti kathetukāmatāya kāraṇaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0302t:372_8: Arūpe pana tathā ādīnavassa avibhāvitattā vuttaṃ “arūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ yuttarūpa”nti,
tika-s0302t:372_11: “Nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato”ti idaṃ bhagavatā ādīnavaṃ dassetvā rūpe gāho paṭikkhitto, na arūpe,
tika-s0302t:372_12: tasmā “kātabbo nu kho so tatthā”ti micchāgaṇhantānaṃ so tato rūpato nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:372_14: “Āpajjitvā viya hotī”ti sabhāvena pavattamānaṃ “paṭhamavaye”tiādinā rūpassa bhedaṃ vayādīhi vibhajitvā dasseti.
tika-s0302t:373_0: Pādassa uddharaṇeti yathā ṭhapitassa pādassa ukkhipane.
tika-s0302t:373_2: Vītiharaṇanti uddhato pādo yathāṭṭhitaṃ pādaṃ yathā na ghaṭṭeti,
tika-s0302t:373_4: Vossajjananti tathā parapādaṃ vītisāretvā bhūmiyaṃ nikkhipanatthaṃ avossajjanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:373_5: Sannikkhepananti vossajjetvā bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ nikkhipanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:373_7: Tattha tatthevāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paṭhamavayādike eva.
tika-s0302t:373_11: Paṭhamavayādayo eva hettha odhi pabbanti ca adhippetā.
tika-s0302t:373_14: Etanti etaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ yathāvuttaṃ tattha tattheva bhijjanaṃ evaṃ vuttappakārameva.
tika-s0302t:373_16: Tañhi vaṭṭiyā pulakaṃ anatikkamitvāva sā dīpajālā bhijjati.
tika-s0302t:374_2: Evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo anuppannassa nirodhābhāvato.
tika-s0302t:374_4: Anekāni cittakoṭisatasahassāni uppajjantīti vuttamatthaṃ theravādena dīpetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:374_6: tassa pana upaḍḍhaṃ adhikārato vāhasatassāti viññāyati.
tika-s0302t:374_9: “Sādhikaṃ diyaḍḍhasataṃ vāhā”ti daḷhaṃ katvā vadantīti vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:374_11: Mahāraññatāya pavaddhaṃ vanaṃ pavananti āha “pavaneti mahāvane”ti.
tika-s0302t:374_13: Ayamatthoti ayaṃ bhūmiṃ anotaritvā ṭhitasākhāya eva gahaṇasaṅkhāto attho.
tika-s0302t:375_5: imassa cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa ācayopi apacayopī”ti vadantena rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito nāma, “varaṃ,
tika-s0302t:375_7: assutavā puthujjano”tiādiṃ vadantena arūpato nīharitvā rūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito nāma.
tika-s0302t:380_9: Eseva nayoti iminā “nanu ca sotasamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotī”ti evamādiṃ atidisati.
tika-s0302t:380_10: So samphasso jāti uppattiṭṭhānaṃ etassāti tajjātikaṃ,
tika-s0302t:380_12: Taṃ pana yasmā tassa phassassa anucchavikameva hoti,
tika-s0302t:380_13: tasmā tassāruppaṃ tassa phassassa anurūpanti ca attho vutto.
tika-s0302t:380_15: Adharāraṇiyaṃ uttarāraṇiyā mantanavasena ghaṭṭanaṃ iva saṅghaṭṭanaṃ phassena yugaggāho,
tika-s0302t:380_16: tassa pana ghaṭṭanassa nirantarappavattiyā piṇḍitabhāvo idha samodhānaṃ,
tika-s0302t:380_17: na kesañci dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā sahāvaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “saṅghaṭṭanasampiṇḍanenāti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t:380_20: Labbhamānova dhammo saṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya gayhatīti vuttaṃ “saṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya phasso”ti.
tika-s0302t:383_4: Yo hi lābhasakkāranimittaṃ paccayesu gedhena bhikkhūnaṃ apaccavekkhitaparibhogo jāto,
tika-s0302t:383_5: taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ nikkhipi.
tika-s0302t:384_0: Tiṭṭhanti ceva bhagavati katthaci nibaddhavāsaṃ vasante,
tika-s0302t:384_2: Bhikkhūnampi yebhuyyena kappasatasahassaṃ tato bhiyyopi pūritadānapāramisañcayattā tadā mahālābhasakkāro
tika-s0302t:384_7: Pūjitoti mālādipūjāya ceva catupaccayābhipūjāya ca pūjito.
tika-s0302t:384_9: Yassa hi cattāro paccaye sakkatvā suabhisaṅkhate paṇītapaṇīte upanenti,
tika-s0302t:384_19: Bhagavati bhikkhusaṅghe ca loko evaṃ paṭipanno.
tika-s0302t:384_22: Lābhaggayasaggappattanti lābhassa ca yasassa ca aggaṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pattaṃ.
tika-s0302t:386_4: tasmā na tattha apaccavekkhaṇamattena pārājikaṃ paññapetuṃ sakkāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:386_5: Āhārāti “paccayā”tiādinā pubbe āhāresu vuttavidhiṃ sandhāya āha “āhārā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:386_6: Idāni tattha kattabbaṃ atthavaṇṇanaṃ sandhāya “heṭṭhā vuttatthamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:387_8: Tathā hi taṃ “pathe hitanti pātheyya”nti vuccati.
tika-s0302t:387_10: Dullabhatāya taṃ udakaṃ tattha tāretīti kantāraṃ,
tika-s0302t:387_12: Ruḷhīvasena itarampi mahāvanaṃ tathā vuccatīti āha “corakantāra”ntiādi.
tika-s0302t:387_13: Pararājūnaṃ veriādīnañca vasena sappaṭibhayampi araññaṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ “pañcavidha”nti.
tika-s0302t:388_0: Ghanaghanaṭṭhānatoti maṃsassa bahalabahalaṃ thūlathūlaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0302t:388_4: Govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhīti govatakukkuravatādivatacaraṇehi ceva devatāyācanādīhi paṇidhikammehi ca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ.
tika-s0302t:389_0: Yasmā pana sāsane sammāpaṭipajjantassa bhikkhuno āhāraparibhogassa opammabhāvena tesaṃ jāyampatikānaṃ puttamaṃsaparibhogo idha bhagavatā ānīto,
tika-s0302t:389_1: tasmāssa nānākārehi opammattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:389_4: Masussamaṃsañhi kulappasutamanussānaṃ amanuññaṃ hoti aparicitabhāvato gārayhabhāvato ca,
tika-s0302t:389_6: Taruṇamaṃsatāyātiādi pana sabhāvato anabhisaṅkhārato ca amanuññāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:389_9: Tato eva nicchandarāgaparibhoge ṭhitāti vuttaṃ kantārato nittharaṇajjhāsayatāya.
tika-s0302t:389_11: na yāvadatthaparibhogo vigatamaccheramalatā sammohābhāvo āyatiṃ tattha patthanābhāvo sannidhikārābhāvo
tika-s0302t:389_12: apariccajanamadatthābhāvo ahīḷanā avivādaparibhogo cāti upamāyaṃ labbhamānā pakāravisesā,
tika-s0302t:389_13: te tathā nīharitvā upameyye yojetvā dassetuṃ “na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:389_14: Taṃ kāraṇanti taṃ tesaṃ jāyampatīnaṃ yāvadeva kantāranittharaṇatthāya puttamaṃsaparibhogasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:390_5: Vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya cāti visadisūdāharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:391_1: Abbhantare attā nāma atthīti diṭṭhi attūpaladdhi,
tika-s0302t:391_3: Satisampajaññavasenapīti “asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hotī”ti ettha vuttasatisampajaññavasenapi.
tika-s0302t:392_3: na laddha”nti anusocanaṃ vā akatvāti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:394_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ vā ahīḷentena dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena paribhuñjitabboti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:395_0: “Tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte”ti vatvā tāhi kabaḷīkārāhārassa parijānanavidhiṃ dassento “katha”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:395_5: tena pana avinābhāvato sampattavisayagāhitāya ca jivhāpasādassa “ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ kattha paṭihaññatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:395_10: Uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammāti sabbepi ye yathāniddhāritā,
tika-s0302t:395_13: Tesaṃ nāmarūpabhāvena vavatthapitānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ paccayo viññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:395_14: “Tassa saṅkhārā tesaṃ avijjā”ti evaṃ uddhaṃ ārohanavasena paccayaṃ.
tika-s0302t:395_15: Adhoorohanavasena pana saḷāyatanādike pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passati.
tika-s0302t:395_16: Saḷāyatanādayopi hi rūpārūpadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayabhāvena vavatthapetabbāti.
tika-s0302t:395_22: na ito bhiyyo”ti ca yathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhattā.
tika-s0302t:395_32: saṅkhātāyāti aniccatādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ paṭivijjhanavasena lakkhaṇavantasammasanavasena ca pavattañāṇasaṅkhātāya.
tika-s0302t:395_33: Pariññāto hoti anavasesato nāmarūpassa ñātattā tappariyāpannattā ca āhārassa.
tika-s0302t:396_0: Pañca kāmaguṇā kāraṇabhūtā etassa atthīti pañcakāmaguṇiko.
tika-s0302t:396_6: Idāni imā tissopi pariññāyo vibhāgena dassetuṃ “yo bhikkhū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:396_7: Jivhādvāre ekarasataṇhaṃ parijānātīti jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā iti paṭisañcikkhati “yo yamettha raso,
tika-s0302t:396_8: so vatthukāmavasena ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ hoti jivhāyatanaṃ pasādo.
tika-s0302t:396_11: Taṃsahajāto vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā jīvitindriyanti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho nāma.
tika-s0302t:396_17: Tattha tenāti yo bhikkhu jivhādvāre rasataṇhaṃ parijānāti, tena.
tika-s0302t:396_18: Kathaṃ pana ekasmiṃ dvāre taṇhaṃ parijānato pañcasu dvāresu rāgo pariññāto hotīti āha “kasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:396_19: Tassāyevāti taṇhāya eva taṇhāsāmaññato ekattanayavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:396_26: Pañcamagge hanatoti pañcasu maggesu sañcarittaṃ karontena maggagāmino hananto “magge hanato”ti vutto.
tika-s0302t:397_0: Sabyañjane piṇḍapātasaññite bhattasamūhe manuññe rūpe rūpasaddādayo labbhanti,
tika-s0302t:398_3: Na hi āhārālābhena jighacchādubbalyaparetassa kāmaparibhogicchā sambhavati.
tika-s0302t:399_0: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti pañcavidhampi uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:399_5: Kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti imaṃ paṭhamāhārakathaṃ kathentena dhammakathikena.
tika-s0302t:403_0: Tisso pariññāti heṭṭhā vuttā ñātapariññādayo tisso pariññā.
tika-s0302t:403_2: Desanā yāva arahattā kathitā sabbaso vedanāsu pariññātāsu kilesānaṃ lesassapi abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:406_1: Phuṇantīti attano upari sayameva ākirantīti attho.
tika-s0302t:406_5: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatīti bhayassa vasena karonto bhayaṃ labhati nāma.
tika-s0302t:407_0: Aṅgārakāsu viya tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ ekādasannaṃ aggīnaṃ vasena mahāpariḷāhato. Jivi…pe…
tika-s0302t:407_4: Āyūhanūpakaḍḍhanānaṃ kālabhedo na cintetabbo ekantabhāvino phalassa nipphāditattāti āha “kammaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:408_4: upādānapaccayā bhavo”ti vacanato manosañcetanāya taṇhā mūlakāraṇanti āha “taṇhāmūlakattā manosañcetanāyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:408_6: Keci pana yasmā manosañcetanāya phalabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca taṇhā uppajjati,
tika-s0302t:412_3: Ādinnappahāravaṇāni tīṇi sattisatāni viya puthujjanassa āturamānamahādukkhapatiṭṭhaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:417_2: Rañjanavasenāti raṅgajātaṃ viya tassa cittassa anurañjanavasena.
tika-s0302t:417_5: Eko eva hi lobho pavattiākāravasena tathā vutto.
tika-s0302t:417_13: Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañhi attanā sahajātānaṃ sahajātādipaccayehi ceva āhārapaccayena ca paccayo hutvā tassa
tika-s0302t:417_16: Vaṭṭakathā esāti katvā “yatthāti tebhūmakavaṭṭe bhumma”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:417_18: Purimapade etaṃ bhummanti “yattha tatthā”ti āgataṃ etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ purimasmiṃ purimasmiṃ pade visayabhūte.
tika-s0302t:417_19: Tañhi ārabbha etaṃ “yattha tatthā”ti bhummavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:417_21: Āyatiṃ vaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ “yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattī”ti vacanato.
tika-s0302t:417_22: Punabbhavābhinibbattīti ca paṭisandhi adhippetāti vuttaṃ “yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti,
tika-s0302t:418_4: Keci pana kilesavaṭṭakammagatikālā cāti adhippāyena “kālagatiādayo ca kammassa sambhārā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0302t:418_5: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanāya tathā tathā gato tividho bhavova tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ.
tika-s0302t:419_0: Saṅkhipitvāti tīsu akatvā viññāṇena ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0302t:419_7: Tena cettha eko sandhi hetuphalasandhi veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:420_0: Khīṇāsavassa aggamaggādhigamanatova pavattakammassa maggena sahāyavekallassa katattā avijjamānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:423_3: sambodhā”tiādi heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitamevāti avuttameva saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “nāmarūpe kho satī”ti āraddho.
tika-s0302t:423_4: Tattha dvādasapadike paṭiccasamuppāde imasmiṃ sutte yāni dve padāni aggahitāni,
tika-s0302t:423_5: nesaṃ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetukāmo tesaṃ gahetabbakāraṇaṃ tāva dassento “etthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:423_6: Paccakkhabhūtaṃ paccuppannaṃ bhavaṃ paṭhamaṃ gahetvā tadanantaraṃ anāgatassa “dutiya”nti gahaṇe atīto
tika-s0302t:423_7: tatiyo hotīti āha “avijjāsaṅkhārā hi tatiyo bhavo”ti.
tika-s0302t:423_8: Nanu cettha anāgatassa bhavassa gahaṇaṃ na sambhavati paccuppannabhavavasena abhinivesassa jotitattāti?
tika-s0302t:423_10: kāraṇe pana gahite phalaṃ gahitameva hotīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:423_11: Apicettha anāgato addhā atthato saṅgahito eva yato “nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana”ntiādinā anāgataddhasaṃgāhitā desanā pavattā,
tika-s0302t:423_15: Ayaṃ vipassanāti addhāpaccuppannavasena udayabbayaṃ passantassa pavattavipassanā.
tika-s0302t:423_18: heṭṭhā gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanīyaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:424_1: Catusaccassa anubodhena na bhavitabbanti āha “na sakkā buddhena bhavitu”nti.
tika-s0302t:424_6: Na parabhāgaṃ khaneyya attanā icchitassa gahitattā parabhāge aññassa abhāvato ca.
tika-s0302t:425_2: “Kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hotī”tiādinā hetuparamparavasena phalaparamparāya kittamānāya,
tika-s0302t:425_3: kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hotīti ca vicāraṇāya saṅkhāre kho sati viññāṇassa visesato kāraṇabhūto saṅkhāro aggahito,
tika-s0302t:425_7: Kiṃ nāma hettha sahajātādivaseneva paccayabhūtaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0302t:425_12: Tato paṭinivattamānaṃ viññāṇaṃ atītabhavopi paṭinivattati nāma.
tika-s0302t:425_14: Nāmarūpaṃ na atikkamatīti paccayabhūtaṃ ārammaṇabhūtañca nāmarūpaṃ na atikkamati tena vinā avattanato.
tika-s0302t:425_16: Viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honteti paṭisandhiviññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte.
tika-s0302t:425_17: Nāmarūpe viññāṇassa paccaye honteti nāmarūpe paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paccaye honte.
tika-s0302t:425_19: Dvīsupi aññamaññaṃ paccayesu hontesūti pana pañcavokārabhavavasena.
tika-s0302t:425_20: Ettakenāti evaṃ viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ aññamaññaṃ upatthambhavasena pavattiyā.
tika-s0302t:425_21: Jāyetha vā upapajjetha vāti “satto jāyati upapajjatī”ti samaññā hoti viññāṇanāmarūpavinimuttassa sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtassa dhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:426_3: Nanu tattha paṭhamatatiyehi catutthapañcamāni atthato abhinnānīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0302t:426_6: Ettāvatāti vuttamevatthanti yo “ettāvatā”ti padena pubbe vutto,
tika-s0302t:426_9: Paccayadhammānañhi attano paccayuppannassa paccayabhāvo idappaccayatā paccayākāro,
tika-s0302t:426_10: so ca “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā vutto saṅkhāruppattiyā anulomanato anulomapaccayākāro,
tika-s0302t:427_1: Dvārasampattiyā tattha vasantānaṃ pavesananiggamanaphāsutāya upabhogaparibhogavatthusampattiyā sarīracittasukhatāya
tika-s0302t:427_4: Pubbe suññabhāvena araññasadisaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ janavāsaṃ karonte nagarassa lakkhaṇappattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0302t:428_0: “Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo ca suparisuddho”ti vacanato tīhi viratīhi saddhiṃ pubbabhāgamaggopi
tika-s0302t:428_2: Vipassanāya ciṇṇanteti vipassanāya sañcaritatāya tattha tattha tāya vipassanāya tīrite pariyesite.
tika-s0302t:429_0: Avattamānakaṭṭhenāti buddhasuññe loke kassaci santāne appavattanatova uppādādivasena vattamānavasena.
tika-s0302t:429_3: Pubbakehi mahesīhi paṭipanno hi ariyamaggo itarehi antarā kehici avaḷañjitoti vuttaṃ “avaḷañjanaṭṭhena purāṇamaggo”ti.
tika-s0302t:432_6: Tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya pāṭihāriyapaññāya ca atthitāya paññavanto na kevalaṃ ajjhattikaaṅgasampattiyeva,
tika-s0302t:433_4: Tenāha “aññattha hi evaṃ vuttaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0302t:433_6: “suṇātha manasi karothā”ti bahuvacanaṃ katvā vuttaṃ nāma natthīti attho.
tika-s0302t:433_7: Keci pana “tenahānandā”ti idhāpi bahuvacanameva katvā paṭhanti “sādhu anuruddhā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0302t:433_12: Ekavārameva hi uppannamattassa dhammassa dubbalattena okāse viya patiṭṭhahanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0302t:433_13: punappunaṃ ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ niviṭṭhaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0302t:434_10: Tasmiṃ sati tuṅgā nāsā yesaṃ te tuṅganāsā.
tika-s0302t:434_11: Evaṃ laddhavohārā sattā attano ghānanti yojanā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato rattakambalapaṭalaṃ viya.
tika-s0302t:435_0: Addasaṃsūti passiṃsu. Evaṃ vuttanti “kaṃse”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ adhiṭṭhānavohārena.
tika-s0302t:437_1: Cattāri pānāni viya cattāro maggā taṇhāpipāsāvūpasamanato.
tika-s0302t:440_1: Sattame kasmā pucchatīti mahākoṭṭhikatthero sayaṃ tattha nikkaṅkho samāno kasmā pucchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:440_2: Ajjhāsayajānanatthanti idampi tassa mahāsāvakassa paracittajānanena appāṭihīraṃ siyā,
tika-s0302t:440_4: Tattha dve aggasāvakāti sīlādiguṇehi uttamasāvakāti attho,
tika-s0302t:440_7: Idāneva kho mayantiādi heṭṭhā paccayuppannaṃ anāloḷentena dassetvā desanā āhaṭā,
tika-s0302t:440_9: idha pana yenādhippāyena taṃ āloḷetvā nivattetvā kathitaṃ mahātherena,
tika-s0302t:440_10: tamevassa adhippāyaṃ teneva pakāsetukāmo mahākoṭṭhikatthero āha “idāneva kho maya”ntiādi.
tika-s0302t:441_0: Ettake ṭhāneti “kiṃ nu kho āvuso”tiādinā paṭhamārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva “nirodho hotī”ti padaṃ,
tika-s0302t:441_2: Avijjāsaṅkhāre aggahetvā “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti desanāya pavattattā “paccayuppannapañcavokārabhavavasena desanā kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:441_3: “Phale gahite kāraṇaṃ gahitamevā”ti viññāṇe gahite saṅkhārā,
tika-s0302t:441_4: tesañca kāraṇabhūtā avijjā gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ “heṭṭhā vissajjitesu dvādasasu padesū”ti.
tika-s0302t:441_8: nirodhā anupādāvinimutto hotī”ti evamāgatānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vārānaṃ vasena.
tika-s0302t:441_9: “Aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhī”tiādīsu viya idha vatthusaddo kāraṇapariyāyoti āha “chattiṃsāya kāraṇehī”ti.
tika-s0302t:444_1: Aṭṭhame parassa saddahitvāti parassa vacanaṃ saddahitvā.
tika-s0302t:444_7: na aññathā”ti attano matiyā cintentassa ruccati.
tika-s0302t:444_8: Ruciyā gaṇhātīti parapattiyo ahutvā sayameva tathā rocento gaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t:444_9: Anussavoti “anu anu suta”nti evaṃ cirakālagatāya anussutiyā labbhamānaṃ “kathamidaṃ siyā,
tika-s0302t:444_12: Ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhātīti yathāparikappitavatthu cittassa upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0302t:444_14: Ekā diṭṭhi uppajjatīti “yathāparikappitaṃ kiñci atthaṃ evametaṃ,
tika-s0302t:444_22: Tāni hi saddheyyānaṃ vatthūnaṃ gahaṇahetubhāvato “kāraṇānī”ti vuttāni.
tika-s0302t:444_23: Bhavanirodho nibbānanti navavidhopi bhavo nirujjhati ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti bhavanirodho, nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:444_24: Svāyaṃ bhavo pañcakkhandhasaṅgaho tabbinimutto natthīti āha “pañcakkhandhanirodho nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0302t:444_25: Bhavanirodho nibbānaṃ nāmāti “nibbānaṃ nāma bhavanirodho”ti esa pañho sekkhehipi jānitabbo,
tika-s0302t:445_0: Suṭṭhu diṭṭhanti “bhavanirodho nibbāna”nti mayā suṭṭhu yāthāvato diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0302t:445_2: bhavanirodhassa ca nissaraṇavivekāsaṅkhatāmataṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya diṭṭhattā.
tika-s0302t:445_3: Anāgāmiphale ṭhito hi anāgāmimagge ṭhito eva nāma uparimaggassa anadhigatattāti vuttaṃ “anāgāmimagge ṭhitattā”ti.
tika-s0302t:445_4: Nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattampi therassetaṃ ñāṇaṃ “nibbānaṃ paccavekkhatī”ti vuttañāṇaṃ viya na hotīti vuttaṃ “ekūnavīsatiyā…pe…
tika-s0302t:445_6: Etena etaṃ nibbānapaccavekkhaṇā viya na hoti sappadesabhāvatoti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:445_7: Evañca katvā idha udapānanidassanampi samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:445_10: Upari arahattaphalasamayoti upari sijjhanato arahattapaṭilābho tathā atthi.
tika-s0302t:448_1: Navame udakavaḍḍhanasamayeti sabbadivasesu mahāsamuddassa anto mahantacandakantamaṇipabbatānaṃ juṇhasamphassena
tika-s0302t:448_3: Upari gacchantoti pakatiyā udakassa tiṭṭhaṭṭhānassa tato upari gacchantoti attho.
tika-s0302t:448_4: Upari yāpetīti udakaṃ tattha uparūpari vaḍḍheti.
tika-s0302t:448_5: Tathābhūto ca taṃ brūhento pūrentoti vuccatīti āha “vaḍḍheti pūretīti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t:448_6: Yasmā paccayadhammā attano phalasamavāyapaccaye honte tassa upari ṭhito viya hoti tassa attano vase vattāpanato,
tika-s0302t:451_1: Dasame garukatoti garubhāvahetūnaṃ uttamaguṇānaṃ matthakappattiyā anaññasādhāraṇena garukārena garukato.
tika-s0302t:451_3: Tāya hi viññūnaṃ manāpatāti āha “manena piyāyito”ti.
tika-s0302t:451_5: Yadatthaṃ saṃgītikārehi “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hotī”tiādinā imassa suttassa nidānaṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-s0302t:451_8: Aṃsakūṭatoti uttarāsaṅgena ubho aṃsakūṭe paṭicchādetvā ṭhitā dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato,
tika-s0302t:452_3: Dhammanti tassaṃ tassaṃ parisāyaṃ therassa asammukhā desitaṃ dhammaṃ.
tika-s0302t:453_0: Kiñcāpi susimo pūraṇādayo viya satthupaṭiñño na hoti,
tika-s0302t:453_1: titthiyehi pana “ayaṃ brāhmaṇapabbajito paññavā vedaṅgakusalo”ti gaṇācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
tika-s0302t:453_5: Tathā hesa bhagavato sammukhā upagantuṃ asakkhi.
tika-s0302t:454_0: Aññāti arahattassa nāmaṃ aññindriyassa ciṇṇante pavattattā.
tika-s0302t:455_0: Aṅgasantatāyāti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ vidūrabhāvena jhānaṅgānaṃ vūpasantatāya.
tika-s0302t:455_5: Ārammaṇasantatāya vā tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā.
tika-s0302t:456_0: Vināpi samādhinti samathalakkhaṇappattaṃ purimasiddhaṃ vināpi samādhinti vipassanāyānikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:456_5: Vipassanāya nipphatti maggo vā phalaṃ vāti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:457_0: Rūpādīsu cetesu tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ parivattanavasena desanā teparivaṭṭadesanā.
tika-s0302t:457_2: idāni arahattādhigamena sabbaso paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhitvā tattha vigatasammohoti anuyogaṃ karonto.
tika-s0302t:457_4: nijjhānako sukkhavipassako ca hutvā āsavānaṃ khayasammasane suppatiṭṭhito,
tika-s0302t:457_6: tasmā “api pana tumhe āyasmanto”tiādinā na te tayā anuyuñjitabbāti.
tika-s0302t:462_1: Ekekaṃ suttaṃ katvā ekādasa suttāni vuttāni avijjāya vasena desanāya anāgatattā,
tika-s0302t:462_4: idha pana veneyyajjhāsayavasena tathā na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:467_1: Ayaṃ satthā nāmāti ayaṃ ariyamaggassa atthāya sāsati vimuttidhammaṃ anusāsatīti satthā nāma.
tika-s0302t:467_6: sabbaṃ vāssa upakārāvahaṃ sahati vāhetīti sabbasahaṃ.
tika-s0302t:467_8: Antarāya sahanaṃ mohanāsanavīriyaṃ ātappati kileseti ātappaṃ.
tika-s0302t:475_2: Yathā kesā dīghaso dvaṅgulamattāya sabbasmiṃ kāle etappamāṇāva,
tika-s0302t:475_9: Kāmaṃ purimapadaṃ dukkhakkhandhassa atītabhāvaṃ upādāyapi vattuṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:475_10: Puretaraṃyeva pana vuttabhāvaṃ upādāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “purimaṃ dukkhakkhandha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:475_12: Purimapacchimatā hi taṃ taṃ upādāya vuccatīti idhādhippetaṃ purimaṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ “katamaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:475_13: “Atītampi parikkhīṇa”nti idhādhippetaṃ parikkhīṇameva vibhāvetuṃ “katamaṃ pana parikkhīṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:475_14: Sotāpannassa dukkhakkhayo idha coditoti taṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamamaggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyyā”ti vatvā
tika-s0302t:475_15: idāni taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ puna “katama”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:475_16: Sattasu attabhāvesu yaṃ apāye uppajjeyya aṭṭhamaṃ paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā yattha katthaci apāyesu cāti yaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-s0302t:481_4: Pāḷiyaṃ vibhattilopena niddesoti tamatthaṃ dassento “tīṇi vā”ti āha.
tika-s0302t:485_0: Chaṭṭhādīsu vuttanayenevāti idha chaṭṭhasuttādīsu paṭhamasuttādīsu vuttanayenevāti attho veditabbo visesābhāvato.
tika-s0302t:495_1: Paṭhamanti imasmiṃ nidānavagge saṃyuttānaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgītattā.
tika-s0302t:495_4: Tato eva sabhāvassa dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātūti laddhanāmānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:495_12: ekā kiriyā manodhātūti tisso manodhātuyo manodhātu “mananamattā dhātū”ti katvā.
tika-s0302t:495_16: Na hi nesaṃ rūpāyatanādīnaṃ viya viññāṇehi aññaviññāṇena gahetabbatākāro atthi.
tika-s0302t:498_3: Dhammaparicchedavasena dhātudesanāyaṃ tisso mananamattā dhātuyova manodhātuyo.
tika-s0302t:498_4: Kiriyāmayassa cittuppattivibhāgena paccayuppannassa vasena dhātudesanāyaṃ mananaṭṭhena dhātutāya sāmaññato
tika-s0302t:498_6: Tasmāti yasmā kāmaṃ sampaṭicchanamanodhātuanantaraṃ uppajjamāno santīraṇaviññāṇadhātuyā sampayutto phassopi manosamphasso eva nāma,
tika-s0302t:498_7: dubbalattā pana so sabbabhavesu asambhavato ca gahito anavasesato gahaṇaṃ na hotīti manodvāre javanasamphasso hoti, tasmā.
tika-s0302t:498_8: Ayamettha atthoti ayaṃ idha adhippāyānugato attho.
tika-s0302t:501_1: Manosamphassaṃ paṭiccāti manodvāre paṭhamajavanasampayutto phasso manosamphasso,
tika-s0302t:504_1: Sabbāpi tasmiṃ dvāre vedanā vatteyyuṃ cakkhusamphassavedanā upanissayapaccayabhāvitā.
tika-s0302t:507_1: Tatiyacatutthesu vuttanayāvāti “no cakkhusamphassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati cakkhudhātū”ti evaṃ vuttanayo,
tika-s0302t:507_6: Kasmā pana tesu suttesu evaṃ desanā pavattāti āha “sabbāni cetānī”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:507_7: Paṭisedho pana tesaṃ vedanānānattādīnaṃ phassanānattādikassa paccayabhāvato tathāuppattiyā asambhavato.
tika-s0302t:507_8: Ito paresūti “no pariyesanānānattaṃ paṭicca uppajjati pariḷāhanānatta”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0302t:513_1: Āpāthe patitanti cakkhussa āpāthagataṃ sāṭakaveṭhanādisaññitaṃ bhūtasaṅghātaṃ sammā nissitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:513_3: cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttasaññāgahaṇeneva vā gahetabbato “rūpasaññāti cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā saññā”ti vuttaṃ tattha saññāya eva labbhanato.
tika-s0302t:513_4: Eteneva hi taṃsampayutto saṅkappoti idampi saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:513_6: Javanasampayuttassa vitakkassa chandagatikattā vuttaṃ “tīhi cittehi sampayutto saṅkappo”ti.
tika-s0302t:513_10: Sannissayaḍāharasā hi rāgaggiādayo “rūpe”ti pana tassa ārammaṇadassanametaṃ.
tika-s0302t:513_13: “Pariḷāho”ti daḷhajjhosānā balavākārappattā vuttāti āha “pariḷāhapariyesanā pana nānājavanavāreyeva labbhantī”ti.
tika-s0302t:513_15: Iminā nayenāti “uppajjati saññānānatta”nti ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:513_16: “Rūpasaññādinānāsabhāvaṃ saññaṃ paṭicca kāmasaṅkappādinānāsabhāvo saṅkappo uppajjatī”tiādinā nayena veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:516_0: 92. Paṭisedhamattameva nānaṃ, sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:519_1: Vuttappakāre ārammaṇeti “āpāthe patita”ntiādinā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre rūpārammaṇe.
tika-s0302t:519_4: taṃ phusanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ārammaṇaṃ phusamāno”ti.
tika-s0302t:519_5: Taṇhāya vatthubhūtaṃyeva rūpārammaṇaṃ labbhatīti katvā “rūpalābho”ti adhippetanti āha “saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho”ti.
tika-s0302t:519_6: Sabbasaṅgāhikanayoti ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe sabbesaṃ saññādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiyā sabbasaṅgaṇhanavasena dassitanayo.
tika-s0302t:519_8: Sabbasaṅgāhikanayoti vā dhuvaparibhogavasena nibaddhārammaṇanti vā āgantukārammaṇanti vā vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasaṅgāhikanayo.
tika-s0302t:519_10: Missakoti āgantukārammaṇe nibaddhārammaṇe ca visayato nibaddhārammaṇena missako.
tika-s0302t:519_13: Yaṃ kiñci viyāti yaṃ kiñci aññamaññaṃ viya.
tika-s0302t:521_5: Parivaṭṭetvāti majjhe gahitaphassavedanāpariyosāne ṭhapanavasena pāḷiṃ parivaṭṭetvā.
tika-s0302t:522_0: 94. Dasamaṃ uttānameva navame vuttanayattā. Paṭisedhamattameva hettha nānattanti.
tika-s0302t:527_11: Desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti desanaṃ uddesamatte eva ṭhapesi.
tika-s0302t:527_12: Pāḷiyaṃ “andhakāraṃ paṭicca paññāyatī”ti etthāpi ārammaṇameva gahitaṃ,
tika-s0302t:527_13: tathā “ayaṃ dhātu asubhaṃ paṭicca paññāyatī”ti etthāpi.
tika-s0302t:527_14: Yathā hi idha suvaṇṇaṃ kasiṇaṃ subhanti adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0302t:528_4: Andhakāro tāva ālokena paricchinno hotu “yattha āloko natthi,
tika-s0302t:528_5: tattha andhakāro”ti āloko kathaṃ andhakārena paricchinno hotīti āha “andhakārena hi so pākaṭo hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t:528_6: Paricchedalekhāya viya cittarūpaṃ andhakārena hi parito paricchinno hutvā paññāyati,
tika-s0302t:528_8: Eseva nayoti asubhasubhānaṃ aññamaññaparicchinnataṃ atidisitvā tattha adhippetameva dassento “asubhe sati subhaṃ paññāyatī”ti āha.
tika-s0302t:528_10: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu viya uttarapadalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “rūpaṃ paṭiccāti rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ paṭiccā”ti.
tika-s0302t:528_12: Rūpasamatikkamā vā hotīti sabhāvārammaṇānaṃ rūpajjhānānaṃ samatikkamā ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hotīti attho.
tika-s0302t:528_13: Eseva nayoti iminā “ākāsānañcāyatanasamatikkamā viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hotī”tiādinā dvepi pakāre atidisati.
tika-s0302t:529_0: Kathaṃ samāpatti pattabbāti imāsu sattasu dhātūsu kā pakārā saññāsamāpatti nānā hutvā samāpajjitabbā.
tika-s0302t:532_4: Kāmapaṭisaṃyuttoti kāmarāgasaṅkhātena kāmena paṭisaṃyutto vā kāmapaṭibaddho vā.
tika-s0302t:532_9: Ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropentaṃ viya pavattatīti cetaso abhiniropanā.
tika-s0302t:532_11: Aññesu ca kāmapaṭisaṃyuttesu vijjamānesu vitakko eva kāmadhātusaddena niruḷho daṭṭhabbo vitakkassa kāmapasaṅgappattisātisayattā.
tika-s0302t:532_13: Sabbepi akusalā dhammā kāmadhātu hīnajjhāsayehi kāmetabbadhātubhāvato.
tika-s0302t:533_0: Kilesakāmassa ārammaṇabhāvattā sabbākusalasaṃgāhikāya kāmadhātuyā itarā dve saṅgahetvā kathanaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā.
tika-s0302t:533_1: Tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato kathā asambhinnā.
tika-s0302t:534_1: so eva nijjīvaṭṭhena sabhāvadhāraṇaṭṭhena dhātūti byāpādadhātu.
tika-s0302t:534_5: Visesena hi parassa attano ca dukkhāpanaṃ vihiṃsā,
tika-s0302t:535_3: Avaḍḍhiṃ vināsanti avaḍḍhiñceva vināsañcāti vadanti sabbaso vaḍḍhirahitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:536_0: Samatābhāvato samatāvirodhato visamatāhetuto ca visamā rāgādayoti āha “rāgavisamādīni anugata”nti.
tika-s0302t:537_2: Svāyaṃ nekkhammasaddo pabbajjādīsu kusalavitakke ca niruḷhoti āha “nekkhammavitakkopi nekkhammadhātū”ti.
tika-s0302t:537_9: soḷasasu ākāresu dukkhasacce santāpaṭṭho viya vutto,
tika-s0302t:538_1: tena vā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo na kiñci byāpādetīti abyāpādo,
tika-s0302t:541_4: tāva netvā upagantvā seti etthāti āsayo,
tika-s0302t:541_8: Saññā uppajjatītiādīsu hīnādibhedaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ paṭicca hīnādibhedā saññā,
tika-s0302t:541_10: vitakko ca uppajjati sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā ca.
tika-s0302t:541_13: Asammāsambuddhesūti ādhāre visaye ca bhummaṃ ekato katvā vuttanti paṭhamaṃ tāva dassento “mayaṃ sammāsambuddhā”tiādiṃ
tika-s0302t:541_15: Tesaṃ “mayaṃ sammāsambuddhā”ti uppannadiṭṭhi idha mūlabhāvena pucchitā,
tika-s0302t:542_3: Kasmā panettha “yadidaṃ avijjā dhātū”ti avijjaṃ uddharitvā “hīnaṃ dhātuṃ paṭiccā”ti ajjhāsayadhātu niddiṭṭhāti?
tika-s0302t:542_7: Avijjāgahito hi purisapuggalo diṭṭhajjhāsayo hīnādibhedaṃ avijjādhātuṃ nissāya tato saññādiṭṭhiādike saṅkappeti.
tika-s0302t:542_9: sā pana tathā tathā cittassa ṭhapanavasena hotīti āha “cittaṭṭhapana”nti.
tika-s0302t:542_11: Eteti hīnapaccayā saññādiṭṭhivitakkacetanā patthanā paṇidhisaṅkhātā hīnā dhammā.
tika-s0302t:542_13: Sabbapadānīti “paññapetī”tiādīni padāni yojetabbāni hīnasaddena majjhimuttamaṭṭhānantarassa asambhavato.
tika-s0302t:542_14: Upapajjanaṃ “upapattī”ti āha “dve upapattiyo paṭilābho ca nibbatti cā”ti.
tika-s0302t:542_18: Cittuppādakkhaṇeti idaṃ hīnattikapariyāpannānaṃ cittuppādānaṃ vasena tattha tattha laddhattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:542_20: Dvādasaakusalacittuppādānaṃ pana yo koci paṭilābho hīnoti yojanā.
tika-s0302t:545_1: Ekato hontīti samānacchandatāya ajjhāsayato ekato honti.
tika-s0302t:545_2: Nirantarā hontīti tāya eva samānacchandatāya cittena nibbisesā honti.
tika-s0302t:545_3: Idha adhimutti nāma ajjhāsayadhātūti āha “hīnādhimuttikāti hīnajjhāsayā”ti.
tika-s0302t:548_4: khandhānaṃ vā antaraṃ viseso atthīti khandhantaro.
tika-s0302t:549_1: Pariharaṇaggahaṇeneva samādānaṃ siddhaṃ hotīti taṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:551_0: Saṅkhepavitthāragambhīruttānavicitrakathādīsūti saṅkhepo vitthāro gambhīratā uttānatā vicitrabhāvo neyyatthatā
tika-s0302t:551_1: nītatthatāti evamādīsu dhammassa kathetabbappakāresu taṃ taṃ kathetabbākāraṃ.
tika-s0302t:559_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-s0302t:560_1: Aṭṭhuppattinti tassa tassa suttassa jātakassa ca aṭṭhuppattiṃ.
tika-s0302t:561_0: Kulasaṅgaṇhanaparihāranti lābhuppādanatthaṃ kulānaṃ saṅgaṇhanavidhino pariharaṇaṃ tanniyamitaṃ ekantikaṃ kulasaṅgahaṇavidhiṃ.
tika-s0302t:565_1: vanathoti ca kileso vuccatīti āha “vanatho jātoti kilesavanaṃ jāta”nti.
tika-s0302t:568_10: Yasmā tādisānaṃ vīriyaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nāma hoti kiccasiddhiyā,
tika-s0302t:571_1: Aṭṭhamādīnīti aṭṭhamaṃ navamaṃ dasamaṃ ekādasamaṃ dvādasamanti imāni pañca suttānīti eke.
tika-s0302t:576_1: Ito paresūti ito dutiyavaggato paresu suttesu.
tika-s0302t:576_3: Kasmā panettha evaṃ desanā pavattāti āha “evaṃ vuccamāne”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:579_4: Tasmiṃ tiṭṭhantīti tasmiṃ pamāde pamajjanavasena tiṭṭhantīti attho.
tika-s0302t:580_4: atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātenti saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātentīti attho.
tika-s0302t:580_14: Mammacchedikāti etena parassa mammacchedavasena ekantapharusasañcetanā pharusavācā nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0302t:580_15: Abhijjhāsaddo lubbhane niruḷhoti āha “parabhaṇḍe lubbhanasīlāti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t:580_18: Sādhūhi garahitabbataṃ pattā “natthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattā natthikāhetukaakiriyadiṭṭhi kammapathapariyāpannā nāma.
tika-s0302t:581_4: Payogavatthumahantatādīhi mahāsāvajjatā tehi paccayehi uppajjamānāya cetanāya balavabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:581_5: Yathāvuttapaccayavipariyāyepi taṃtaṃpaccayehi cetanāya balavabhāvavasena appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā vā veditabbā.
tika-s0302t:582_3: Gārayhatā cassa ekantanihīnatāyāti āha “ekantanindito lāmakācāro”ti asaddhammādhippāyenāti asaddhammasevanādhippāyena.
tika-s0302t:582_21: Sevanācitte sati payogābhāvo appamāṇaṃ yebhuyyena itthiyā sevanāpayogassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:582_22: Tathā sati puretaraṃ sevanācittassa upaṭṭhānepi tassā micchācāro na siyā,
tika-s0302t:582_24: Tasmā attano ruciyā pavattitassa vasena tayo,
tika-s0302t:582_25: balakkārena pavattitassa vasena tayoti sabbepi aggahitaggahaṇena “cattāro sambhārā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:583_1: tassā ittarakālatāya pavattiyā anāsevanāti paridubbalā hoti cetanā.
tika-s0302t:584_0: Upasaggavasena atthavisesavācino dhātusaddāti abhijjhāyatīti padassa parabhaṇḍābhimukhītiādiattho vutto.
tika-s0302t:584_6: mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjātiādinā nayena tattha appasāvajjamahāsāvajjavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:585_3: Aho vatāti iminā yathā abhijjhāne vatthuno ekantato attano pariṇāmanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0302t:585_4: evamidhāpi vatthuno “aho vatā”ti iminā parassa vināsacintāya ekantato niyamitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0302t:586_0: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvenāti yathātacchagahaṇassa abhāvena aniccādisabhāvassa niccādito gahaṇena.
tika-s0302t:586_2: Samphappalāpo viyāti iminā āsevanassa appamahantatāhi micchādiṭṭhiyā appasāvajjamahāsāvajjatā.
tika-s0302t:587_5: Paṭipāṭiyā sattāti ettha nanu cetanā abhidhamme kammapathesu na vuttāti paṭipāṭiyā sattannaṃ kammapathabhāvo na yuttoti? Na,
tika-s0302t:587_7: Na hi tattha cetanāya akammapathattā kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:587_9: na sabbadāti kammapathabhāvassa aniyatattā avacanaṃ. Yadā,
tika-s0302t:587_12: yadi cetanāya sabbadā kammapathabhāvābhāvato aniyato kammapathabhāvoti kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ,
tika-s0302t:587_13: nanu abhijjhādīnampi kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ atthitāya aniyato kammapathabhāvoti tesampi kammapatharāsimhi avacanaṃ āpajjatīti?
tika-s0302t:587_16: Yadi evaṃ cetanāpi tattha vattabbā siyā?
tika-s0302t:587_18: Sā pana pāṇātipātādikāti pākaṭo tassā kammapathabhāvoti na vuttā siyā.
tika-s0302t:587_24: Kammaṃyeva ca sugatiduggatīnaṃ tatthuppajjanakasukhadukkhānañca pathabhāvena pavattaṃ kammapathoti vuccatīti pākaṭo,
tika-s0302t:587_29: te eva tena sabhāvena dassetuṃ abhidhamme kammapatharāsibhāvena vuttā.
tika-s0302t:587_30: Atathājātiyakattā vā cetanā tehi saddhiṃ na vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:588_0: Adinnādānaṃ sattārammaṇanti idaṃ “pañca sikkhāpadā parittārammaṇā evā”ti imāya pāḷiyā virujjhati.
tika-s0302t:588_4: “Sattārammaṇa”nti vā sattasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva upādāya vuttattā na koci virodho.
tika-s0302t:588_5: Tathā hi vuttaṃ sammohavinodaniyaṃ “yāni sikkhāpadāni ettha ‘sattārammaṇānī’ti vuttāni,
tika-s0302t:588_6: tāni yasmā ‘sattoti’ti saṅkhaṃ gate saṅkhāreyeva ārammaṇaṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0302t:588_14: “Natthi sattā opapātikā”ti pavattamānāpi micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammārammaṇā evāti adhippāyena tassā saṅkhārārammaṇatā vuttā.
tika-s0302t:588_15: Kathaṃ pana micchādiṭṭhiyā mahaggatappattā dhammā ārammaṇaṃ hontīti?
tika-s0302t:588_17: Natthi sukaṭadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti hi pavattamānāya atthato rūpārūpāvacaradhammāpi gahitāva hontīti.
tika-s0302t:589_1: hāso pana tesaṃ aññavisayoti āha “sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana nesaṃ dukkhasampayuttāva hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t:589_5: Lobhasamuṭṭhāno musāvādo sukhavedano vā siyā majjhattavedano vā,
tika-s0302t:589_6: dosasamuṭṭhāno dukkhavedano vāti musāvādo tivedano siyā.
tika-s0302t:589_7: Iminā nayena sesesupi yathārahaṃ vedanānaṃ “lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyā”tiādinā bhedo veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:590_0: Pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlakoti sampayuttamūlameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:591_2: Kilesānaṃ samucchindanavasena pavattā maggasampayuttā virati samucchedavirati.
tika-s0302t:591_4: sikkhāpadavibhaṅge pana cetanāpi āharitvā dassitāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “cetanāpi vaṭṭanti viratiyopī”ti āha.
tika-s0302t:592_0: Adussīlyārammaṇā jīvitindriyādiārammaṇā kathaṃ dussīlyāni pajahantīti dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:592_1: Pāṇātipātādīhi viramaṇavasena pavattanato tadārammaṇabhāveneva tāni pajahanti.
tika-s0302t:592_2: Na hi tadeva ārabbha taṃ pajahituṃ sakkā tato anissaṭabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:593_2: Na hi manoduccaritato virati atthi anabhijjhādīheva tappahānasiddhito.
tika-s0302t:596_5: Na hi ñāṇassa micchābhāvo nāma atthi.
tika-s0302t:596_10: guṇaviyuttassa attano sakattani avaṭṭhānanti evamādiṃ akusalapavattiṃ “kusalavimuttī”ti gahetvā ṭhitā micchāvimuttikā.
tika-s0302t:596_11: Sammāpaccavekkhaṇāti jhānavimokkhādīsu sammā aviparītaṃ pavattā paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-s0302t:601_2: Ābandhanadhātūti nahāniyacuṇṇassa udakaṃ viya sahajātadhammānaṃ ābandhanabhūtā dhātu.
tika-s0302t:601_3: Paripācanadhātūti sūriyo phalādīnaṃ viya sahajātadhammānaṃ paripācanabhūtā dhātu.
tika-s0302t:601_4: Vitthambhanadhātūti dutiyo viya sahajātadhammānaṃ vitthambhanabhūtā dhātu.
tika-s0302t:601_6: saddena pittādayo santappanādayo uddhaṅgamā vātādayo gahitā.
tika-s0302t:604_1: Ayaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ nissāya taṃ ārabbha pavatto assādo.
tika-s0302t:604_2: Evaṃ pavattānanti evaṃ kāye pabhāvassa pavedanavaseneva pavattānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:604_3: Hutvā abhāvākārenāti pubbe avijjamānā paccayasāmaggiyā hutvā uppajjitvā puna bhaṅgupagamanato uddhaṃ abhāvākārena.
tika-s0302t:604_8: Sabhāvadhammā hi appamattaṃ khaṇaṃ patvā nirujjhanti.
tika-s0302t:604_9: Tasmā te “jarāya maraṇena cā”ti dvedhā vipariṇamanti.
tika-s0302t:605_0: Sāyaṃ nipannā sabbarattiṃ khepetvā pāto uṭṭhahāma, māsapuṇṇaghaṭo viya no sarīraṃ nissandābhāvato.
tika-s0302t:607_1: Evaṃ vuttanayena pavattā puggalā etā pathavīdhātuādayo assādenti nāma abhirativasena tattha ākaṅkhuppādanato.
tika-s0302t:608_3: Sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bodhi sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ bujjhanato.
tika-s0302t:610_6: saddo “pahānapaṭivedho”ti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbo “ayaṃ pahānapaṭivedho paṭivijjhitabbaṭṭhena samudayasacca”nti.
tika-s0302t:610_8: Yāti yathāvuttesu assādo ādīnavo nissaraṇanti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu pavattā yā diṭṭhi…pe…
tika-s0302t:613_2: evaṃ yāvatā ādīnavapariyesanaṭṭhāne assādapariyesanā sammāpaṭipannassāti vuttaṃ “acarinti ñāṇacārena acariṃ,
tika-s0302t:619_1: Ekanteneva dukkhāti avīcimahānirayo viya ekantato dukkhā eva sukhena avomissā.
tika-s0302t:619_3: Dukkhena okkantāti bahiddhā viya antopi dukkhena avakkantā anupaviṭṭhā.
tika-s0302t:619_4: Sukhavedanāpaccayatāya imāsaṃ dhātūnaṃ sukhatā viya dukkhavedanāpaccayatāpi veditabbā,
tika-s0302t:619_8: Paṭhamaṃ sukhaṃ dassetvāpi pacchā dukkhassa kathitattā “dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ kathita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:622_4: Catusaccamevāti cattāri saccāni samāhaṭāni catusaccanti tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t:632_1: Upasaggo samāsavisaye sasādhanaṃ kiriyaṃ dassetīti vuttaṃ “ñāṇena anugantvāpī”ti.
tika-s0302t:632_3: tato bhiyyopi anugantvā anamataggo eva saṃsāro. Agga-
tika-s0302t:632_6: Aññathā antimabhavikaparicchinnakatavimuttiparipācanīyadhammādīnaṃ vasena aparicchinnapubbāparakoṭi na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-s0302t:632_8: Pacchimāpi na paññāyati andhabālānaṃ vasenāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:632_10: Vemajjheyeva pana sattā saṃsaranti pubbāparakoṭīnaṃ alabbhanīyattā.
tika-s0302t:632_14: atthassa vipulatāya taṃsadisā upamā natthīti parittaṃyeva upamaṃ āharantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:638_2: rodanaṃ pana kevalamevāti āha “kandantānanti sasaddaṃ rudamānāna”nti.
tika-s0302t:638_7: Tehi nikkhantarajatarasmiyo indanīlarasmiyo ca ekato hutvā.
tika-s0302t:638_8: Tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ antaresūti tāsaṃ catūhi koṇehi nikkhantarasmīnaṃ catūsu antaresu.
tika-s0302t:641_0: 127. Mātuthaññanti pītaṃ mātuyā thanato nibbattakhīraṃ bahutaranti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:644_1: “Anamataggassa saṃsārassa dīghatamattā na sukaraṃ nasukara”nti aṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
tika-s0302t:644_6: tatopi sukhumataraṃ sāsapamattaṃ khīyeyya pabbataṃ sabbabhāgehi aticiravelaṃ parimajjante.
tika-s0302t:647_1: Nagaranti nagarasaṅkhepena pākārena parikkhittataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:647_2: Anto pana sabbaso vicittasāsapehi eva puṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0302t:650_2: tena anussaritassa satasahassakappassa anantarakappato paṭṭhāyāti attho.
tika-s0302t:650_5: Cattāri kappasatasahassāni divase divase anussareyyunti parikappanavasena vadanti.
tika-s0302t:653_1: Etasmiṃ antareti etasmiṃ pabhavasamuddapadesaparicchinne āyāmato pañcayojanasatike atirekayojanasatike vā ṭhāne.
tika-s0302t:656_3: Tathā sati adhippeto pātassa aniyamo na nidassito siyā.
tika-s0302t:656_4: Tattha ca dhammaṃ suṇantā bhikkhū manussaloke,
tika-s0302t:656_7: Tassa tassa vā puggalassa yathādhippeto ayaṃ loko,
tika-s0302t:659_2: Giriparikkhepeti pañcahi girīhi parikkhittattā “giriparikkhepo”ti laddhanāme rājagahe.
tika-s0302t:664_1: Duggatanti kicchajīvikattā sabbathā dukkhaṃ gataṃ upagataṃ.
tika-s0302t:664_2: Tathābhūto pana daliddo varāko nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “daliddaṃ kapaṇa”nti.
tika-s0302t:664_4: aññehipi sarīrāvayavehi dussaṇṭhānehi upeto durupeto evāti.
tika-s0302t:670_5: Ekekavaṇṇakālova gahetabboti etena mahiṃsādīnaṃ rassadīghapiṅgalādīsu ekekāneva gahetvā dasseti.
tika-s0302t:673_2: mātugāmānañca purisakālo”ti yathā sattasantāne liṅganiyamo natthi,
tika-s0302t:674_0: Cakkavāḷe mātugāmakāle namātābhūtapubbo natthītiādinā liṅganiyamena cakkavāḷaniyamo ca veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:677_1: Ekaṃ apadānaṃ āharitvā dasseti “evaṃ saṃvegaṃ janetvā bhikkhū visesaṃ pāpessāmī”ti.
tika-s0302t:677_3: Dvinnaṃ buddhānanti kakusandhassa koṇāgamanassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ.
tika-s0302t:677_4: “Tivarā rohitassā suppiyā”ti manussānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle samaññā tattha desanāmavasena jātāti veditabbā,
tika-s0302t:678_0: Puna vassasatanti paṭhamavassasatato uparivassasataṃ jīvanako nāma manusso natthi.
tika-s0302t:678_2: Vaḍḍhitvāti dasavassāyukabhāvato paṭṭhāya yāva asaṅkhyeyyāyukabhāvā vaḍḍhitvā.
tika-s0302t:687_1: Santuṭṭhoti sakena uccāvacena paccayena samameva ca tussanako.
tika-s0302t:687_10: Iti yena kenaci hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādipaccayena santussito tathāpavatto alobho itarītarapaccayasantoso,
tika-s0302t:688_0: Yathāladdhato aññassa apatthanā nāma siyā appicchatāya pavattiākāroti tato vinivattitameva santosassa sarūpaṃ dassento “labhantopi na gaṇhātī”ti āha.
