tika-s0302t:688_1: Taṃ parivattetvāti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvaraṃ na phāsubhāvāvahaṃ sarīrabādhāvahañca hotīti payojanavasena,
tika-s0302t:688_3: Lahukacīvaraparibhoge santosavirodhi na hotīti āha “lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti.
tika-s0302t:688_4: Mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā tāni vissajjetvā aññassa gahaṇaṃ yathāsāruppanaye ṭhitattā na santosavirodhīti āha “tesaṃ…pe…
tika-s0302t:689_1: Avasesaniddāya abhibhūtattā paṭibujjhato sahasā pāpakā vitakkā pātubhavantīti.
tika-s0302t:690_2: Buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti “pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya yā pabbajjā”tiādinā sammāsambuddhādīhi pasatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t:691_1: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti seyyathāpi āyasmā bākulatthero.
tika-s0302t:691_3: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi thero upanando sakyaputto.
tika-s0302t:691_5: na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti seyyathāpi thero lāḷudāyī.
tika-s0302t:691_8: Uttasatīti “kathaṃ nu kho labheyya”nti jātuttāsena uttasati.
tika-s0302t:691_13: Lobhoyeva ārammaṇena saddhiṃ ganthanaṭṭhena bajjhanaṭṭhena gedho lobhagedho.
tika-s0302t:692_1: bhagavatā pana vattabbaniyāmena “yathā kassapo bhikkhū”ti bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:692_4: Paṭipattiṃ paripūraṃ katvā pūraṇaṃ bhāro satthu āṇāya sirasā sampaṭicchitabbato.
tika-s0302t:696_3: Anuppannāti veditabbā tathārūpe vatthārammaṇe tathā anuppannapubbattā.
tika-s0302t:696_8: Imeti vuttanayena paccayalābhena pacchā uppajjamānā pāḷiyaṃ tathā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:697_5: Imassa pana sammappadhānassāti catutthassa sammappadhānassa vasena.
tika-s0302t:697_6: Ayaṃ desanāti “uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti ayaṃ desanā katā.
tika-s0302t:697_8: saṃvatteyyāti idaṃ āyatiṃ sattasu attabhāvesu uppajjamānadukkhasaṅkhātaanatthuppattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:697_9: “Ātāpī ottappī bhabbo sambodhāyā”tiādivacanato “ime cattāro sammappadhānā pubbabhāgavipassanāvasena kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:700_5: Attano pana sommabhāvena mahājanassa piyo manāpo.
tika-s0302t:700_8: Na kevalaṃ candūpamatāya ettako eva guṇo,
tika-s0302t:700_9: atha kho aññepi santīti te dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:700_13: evaṃ bhikkhu taṃ taṃ disaṃ upagacchati kulānuddayāya.
tika-s0302t:700_14: Yathā cando kaṇhapakkhato sukkapakkhaṃ upagacchanto kalāhi vaḍḍhamāno hutvā niccanavo hoti,
tika-s0302t:700_15: evaṃ bhikkhu kaṇhapakkhaṃ pahāya sukkapakkhaṃ upagantvā guṇehi vaḍḍhamāno lokassa vā pāmojjapāsaṃsattho
tika-s0302t:700_16: niccanavatāya candasamacitto adhunupasampanno viya ca niccanavo hutvā carati.
tika-s0302t:701_1: Taṃ nekkhammābhimukhaṃ kāyacittānaṃ ākaḍḍhanaṃ kāyato apanayanañca hotīti āha “ākaḍḍhitvā apanetvāti attho”ti.
tika-s0302t:701_2: Catukkañcettha sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ “yo hi bhikkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:702_3: Evaṃ vicariṃsūti kiñjakkhavasena pariggahābhāvena yathā ime,
tika-s0302t:703_6: saddena antaragharappavesane aññattha ca yathāvuttato aññaṃ asāruppakiriyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0302t:703_7: Tatthevāti saṅghamajjhe gaṇamajjhe puggalassa ca vuḍḍhassa santike.
tika-s0302t:704_1: Pāpicchatāpi manopāgabbhiyanti eteneva kodhūpanāhādīnaṃ samudācāro manopāgabbhiyanti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t:705_5: Vāyupatthambhakaṃ gāhāpetvāti kāyaṃ tathā upatthambhakaṃ katvā.
tika-s0302t:707_0: Aṅgulīhi nikkhantapabhā ākāsasañcalanena diguṇā hutvā ākāse vicariṃsūti āha “yamakavijjutaṃ cārayamāno viyā”ti.
tika-s0302t:707_1: “Ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesī”ti padassa aññattha anāgatattā “asambhinnapada”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:708_7: saddena ākāse calitapāṇi viya katthaci alaggatāya parisuddhajjhāsayatā sattesu kāruññanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0302t:711_4: Sā pana avakhaṇḍiyanā dukkhāpanā aṭṭiyanā hotīti vuttaṃ “aṭṭīyatī”ti.
tika-s0302t:711_5: Tenāha bhagavā “so tatonidānaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayatī”ti.
tika-s0302t:714_1: Chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne chiddassa aputhulattā aggaḷaṃ adatvāva suttena saṃsibbanamattena aggaḷadānena ca chidde puthule.
tika-s0302t:715_7: atha kasmā “jiṇṇosi dāni tva”ntiādimavocāti āha “yathā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:716_1: Amānusikā savanaratīti atikkantamānusikāya araññasadduppattiyā araññehaṃ vasāmīti vivekavāsūpanissayādhīnasaddasavanapaccayā dhammarati uppajjati.
tika-s0302t:716_4: Tatthevāti tasmiṃyeva ekassa viharaṇaṭṭhāne viharaṇasamaye ca phāsu bhavati cittavivekasambhavato.
tika-s0302t:717_3: Apiṇḍapātikādhīno itarassa visesajotakoti tamevassa visesaṃ dassetuṃ “akālacārī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:718_0: Amhākaṃ salākaṃ gahetvā bhattatthāya gehaṃ anāgacchantassa sattāhaṃ na pātetabbanti sāmikehi dinnattā sattāhaṃ salākaṃ na labhati,
tika-s0302t:720_0: “Amukasmiṃ senāsane vasantā bahuṃ vassavāsikaṃ labhantī”ti tathā na vassavāsikaṃ pariyesanto carati vassavāsikasseva aggahaṇato.
tika-s0302t:720_2: Tena bahuparikkhārabhāvena phāsuvihāro natthi parikkhārānaṃ rakkhaṇapaṭijagganādidukkhabahulatāya.
tika-s0302t:723_1: Attano ṭhāneti sabrahmacārīnaṃ ovādakaviññāpakabhāvena attano mahāsāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapanatthaṃ.
tika-s0302t:723_2: Atha vā yasmā “ahaṃ dāni na ciraṃ ṭhassāmi,
tika-s0302t:723_5: ovadanto anusāsanto mamaccayena bhikkhūnaṃ mayā kātabbakiccaṃ karissatī”ti adhippāyena bhagavā imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
tika-s0302t:723_15: Atikkamma vadanteti aññamaññaṃ atikkamitvā atimaññitvā vadante.
tika-s0302t:723_16: Bahuṃ bhāsissatīti dhammaṃ kathento ko vipulaṃ katvā kathessati.
tika-s0302t:723_18: Amadhuranti na madhuraṃ na kaṇṇasukhaṃ na pemanīyaṃ.
tika-s0302t:723_19: Lahuññeva uṭṭhāti appavattanena kūlaṭṭhānaṃ viya tassa kathanaṃ.
tika-s0302t:726_4: Na hi kalyāṇamittarahitassa kāci sampatti nāma atthīti.
tika-s0302t:729_6: Evaṃ sakkāre kayiramāneti “bhaddako vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti ādarajātehi bhikkhūhi sakkāre kayiramāne.
tika-s0302t:729_8: “Ehi bhikkhū”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ attano mukhābhimukhaṃ karontā vadanti.
tika-s0302t:729_9: Yañhi tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ upaddavoti vuccati anatthajananato.
tika-s0302t:732_1: Yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṃ “yāvade”ti idaṃ padanti āha “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti.
tika-s0302t:732_5: Āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ khayahetu ariyamaggena sabbaso āsavānaṃ khepitattā.
tika-s0302t:735_1: Lābhasakkārahetupi ekacce bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti,
tika-s0302t:735_2: evamevaṃ ayaṃ pana thero na lābhasakkārahetu bhikkhunupassayagamanaṃ yācati,
tika-s0302t:735_4: Eso hi ānandatthero ussukkāpetvā paṭipattiguṇaṃ dassento yasmā tā bhikkhuniyo catusaccakammaṭṭhānikā,
tika-s0302t:735_5: tasmā pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayādipakāsaniyā dhammakathāya vipassanāpaṭipattisampadaṃ dassesi.
tika-s0302t:735_6: Aniccādilakkhaṇāni ceva udayabbayādike ca sammā dassesi.
tika-s0302t:735_11: Samuttejesīti vipassanāya āraddhāya saṅkhārānaṃ udayabbayādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yathākālaṃ paggahasamupekkhaṇehi
tika-s0302t:735_12: bojjhaṅgānaṃ anupavattanena bhāvanāmajjhimavīthiṃ pāpetvā yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ suppasannaṃ hutvā vahati,
tika-s0302t:735_13: evaṃ indriyānaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇena vipassanācittaṃ sammā uttejesi,
tika-s0302t:735_15: Sampahaṃsesīti tathā pavattiyamānāya vipassanāya samappavattabhāvanāvasena upari laddhabbabhāvanāvasena cittaṃ sampahaṃsesi,
tika-s0302t:736_0: Manute pariññādivasena saccāni bujjhatīti muni. Teti taṃ.
tika-s0302t:736_8: bhante”ti vadantena pakkhapātena viya vuttaṃ hotīti āha “ekā bhikkhunī na vāritā”tiādi.
tika-s0302t:740_1: Rājagahassa dakkhiṇabhāge giri dakkhiṇāgiri ṇa- kāre a-
tika-s0302t:740_5: Ekadivasenāti ekena divasena uppabbājesuṃ tesaṃ saddhāpabbajitābhāvato.
tika-s0302t:741_0: Yattha cattāro vā uttari vā bhikkhū akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ ekato paṭiggaṇhitvā bhuñjanti,
tika-s0302t:741_2: taṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti “tikabhojanaṃ paññatta”nti vacanena gaṇabhojanaṃ paṭikkhittanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0302t:742_0: “Dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaho eva pesalānaṃ phāsuvihāro”ti idaṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ.
tika-s0302t:742_3: saṅghaṃ bhindeyyu”nti iminā kāraṇena tikabhojanaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-s0302t:743_0: Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā tvaṃ asampannagaṇaṃ bandhitvā carasīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:743_1: Asampannāya parisāya cārikācaraṇaṃ kulānuddayāya na hoti,
tika-s0302t:743_2: kulānaṃ ghātitattāti adhippāyena thero “sassaghātaṃ maññe carasī”tiādimavoca.
tika-s0302t:744_1: Uddisituṃ na jānāmi tathā cittasseva anuppannapubbattā.
tika-s0302t:744_6: Sannipātaṭṭhānatoti saṅketaṃ katvā viya kilesarajānaṃ tattha sannijjhapavattanato.
tika-s0302t:745_3: Kiñci sikkhekadesaṃ asesetvā ekanteneva paripūretabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ.
tika-s0302t:745_4: Cittuppādamattampi saṃkilesamalaṃ anuppādetvā accantameva visuddhaṃ katvā pariharitabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ.
tika-s0302t:745_5: Tato eva saṅkhaṃ viya likhitanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ.
tika-s0302t:746_5: Aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassanti bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassañceva saṭṭhisahassāni ca aṭṭha ca sahassāni.
tika-s0302t:747_0: Ayañca ayañca guṇoti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā guṇoti kittento mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya kathesi.
tika-s0302t:749_1: Taraṇaṃ vā hotu maraṇaṃ vāti mahoghaṃ ogāhanto puriso viya maccherasamuddaṃ uttaranto pacchāpi…pe…
tika-s0302t:749_2: pādamūle ṭhapesi bhagavato dhammadesanāya maccherapahānassa kathitattā.
tika-s0302t:750_0: Satthu guṇā kathitā nāma hontīti vuttaṃ “satthu guṇe kathentassā”ti.
tika-s0302t:750_1: Tato paṭṭhāyāti tadā satthu sammukhā dhammassavanato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0302t:752_0: Adinnavipākassāti pubbe katūpacitassa sabbaso na dinnavipākassa.
tika-s0302t:752_1: Tassa kammassāti tassa paccekabuddhassa patte piṇḍapātaṃ chinditvā kalalapūraṇakammassa.
tika-s0302t:752_2: Tasmiṃyeva attabhāve sattasu ṭhānesu duggandhasarīratāya paṭinivattitā.
tika-s0302t:752_4: Ghaṭaniṭṭhakāyāti tassa pantiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapitaiṭṭhakāya saddhiṃ ghaṭetabbaiṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti.
tika-s0302t:752_5: Bhaddake kāleti īdisiyā iṭṭhakāya icchitakāleyeva āgatāsi.

tika-s0302t:764_8: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ahosi nirantaraṃ buddharasmīhi samantato samokiṇṇattā.

tika-s0302t:964_2: Aggi uṭṭhahīti sīghapatanasantāpena ca sūriyarasmisantāpassa āsannabhāvena ca usumā uṭṭhahi.
tika-s0302t:965_1: Pattakaṭāhena otthaṭapatto viyāti pihitapatto viya ahosi,
tika-s0302t:965_2: vegasā patanena nagarassa upari ākāsassa nirikkhaṇaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0302t:965_3: Sañcāritattā anekahaṃsasahassasadiso paññāyi seyyathāpi bodhisattassa dhanuggahakāle sarakūṭādidassane.
tika-s0302t:966_2: Sūriyamaṇḍalañhi atisīghena javena gacchantampi paññāsayojanāyāmavitthataṃ attano vipulatāya pabhassaratāya
tika-s0302t:966_4: javanahaṃso pana tādisena sūriyena saddhiṃ javena gacchanto na paññāyeyya.
tika-s0302t:966_7: Gantvā gahite sotuṃ ghaṇḍaṃ piḷandhāpetvā sayaṃ puratthābhimukho nisinno.
tika-s0302t:967_3: Bahuvacananiddeso pana pāḷiyaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe anekasatasaṅkhassa jīvitindriyassa upalabbhanato.
tika-s0302t:967_5: Tato yathāvuttadevatānaṃ javato sīghataraṃ khīyati ittarakhaṇattā.
tika-s0302t:970_0: Bhedoti bhaṅgo. Na sakkā paññāpetuṃ tatopi ativiya ittarakhaṇattā.
tika-s0302t:973_1: Aññe rājāno ca bhāgaṃ gaṇhantā ime viya dasabhāgaṃ gaṇhantīti tesamayaṃ anugati paññāyati.
tika-s0302t:973_3: Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya āgamanānukkamaṃ dassetuṃ “himavante kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0302t:974_3: Pubbe pharitvā tiṭṭhantassa dvādasa yojanāni pamāṇo etassāti dvādasayojanappamāṇo, saddo.
tika-s0302t:974_4: Athassa anekasatakāle gacchante antosālāyampi dukkhena suyyittha āṇisaṅghāṭamattattā.
tika-s0302t:975_3: Tathā hi tattha tā tā gāthā duviññeyyarūpā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0302t:975_6: tasmā taṃ pāḷivasena “gambhīra”nti vuttaṃ “pāḷivasena gambhīrā sallasuttasadisā”ti.
tika-s0302t:975_7: Iminā nayena “atthavasena gambhīrā”ti ettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0302t:975_13: Sattasuññatadhammamattamevāti sattena attanā suññataṃ kevalaṃ dhammamattameva.
tika-s0302t:975_14: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti ca liṅgavacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha “uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe cā”ti.
tika-s0302t:975_17: taṃ tena katanti vuccatīti āha “kavitāti kavīhi katā”ti.
tika-s0302t:975_24: Tesaṃ sāvakehīti “buddhānaṃ sāvakā”ti apaññātānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci sāvakehi.
tika-s0302t:978_3: Licchavī pana khadiradaṇḍaṃ upadhānaṃ katvā tadā vihariṃsu.
tika-s0302t:978_5: Pakativijjusaññito natthi etesaṃ khaṇo vijjhaneti akkhaṇavedhino tato sīghataraṃ vijjhanato.
tika-s0302t:979_1: Te sandhāyāti te tathārūpe padhānakammikabhikkhū sandhāya.
tika-s0302t:979_2: Idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ atthajātaṃ vuttaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-s0302t:979_4: Padhānānuyuñjanavelāya nivedanavasena tattha tattha ekajjhaṃ pahataghaṇḍinigghoseneva ekaghaṇḍinigghoso,
tika-s0302t:979_5: tattha tattha paṇṇasālādīsu vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena ekapadhānabhūto.
tika-s0302t:982_4: Aparisuddhāsayatāya neva guṇavaṇṇāya na ñāṇabalāya hoti.
tika-s0302t:985_9: Taṃ pana yathāāpannāya āpattiyā “desanā”tveva vuccatīti āha “desanā paññāyatī”ti.
tika-s0302t:988_1: Ettakampīti iminā jarasiṅgālena laddhabbaṃ cittassādamattampi na labhissati sakalameva kappaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0302t:999_1: Sāvakānaṃ ālāpoti sāvakānaṃ sabrahmacāriṃ uddissa ālāpo.
tika-s0302t:999_2: Buddhehi sadisā mā homāti buddhāciṇṇaṃ samudācāraṃ akathentehi sāvakehi,
tika-s0302t:999_6: Dutiyajjhāne vitakkavicārā nirujjhanti tesaṃ nirodheneva tassa jhānassa uppādetabbato.
tika-s0302t:999_7: Yesaṃ nirodhāti yesaṃ vacīsaṅgārānaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ nirujjhanena suvikkhambhitabhāvena saddāyatanaṃ
tika-s0302t:999_11: na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbataggahaṇaṃ viya aparisuddhoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0302t:1000_0: Ārammaṇabhūtena vitakkena saha gatā pavattāti vitakkasahagatāti āha “vitakkārammaṇā”ti.
tika-s0302t:1000_4: Saññāmanasikārāpīti tatiyajjhānādhigamāya pavattiyamānā saññāmanasikārāpi hānabhāgiyāva ahesuṃ,
tika-s0302t:1000_6: Sammā ṭhapehīti bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya sammā ajjhattameva cittaṃ ṭhapehi.
tika-s0302t:1000_7: Ekaggaṃ karohīti teneva vikkhepapaṭibāhanena avihatamānasatāya cittasamādhānavasena ekaggaṃ karohi.
tika-s0302t:1000_8: Āropehīti īsakampi bahumpi apatitaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe āropehi.
tika-s0302t:1000_13: Vaḍḍhetvāti uttari uttari visesabhāgiyabhāvāpādanena samādhiṃ paññañca brūhetvā brūhetvā.
tika-s0302t:1003_1: Atiuḷārampi sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā sandhāya vuttaṃ sabbatthameva sabbaso chandarāgassa suppahīnattā.
tika-s0302t:1008_0: Catubhūmakadhammesu labbhamānattā paññāya “catubhūmakadhamme anupavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:1008_6: Dvīsupi etesūti samādhilakkhaṇavipassanālakkhaṇesu sammāsambuddho nipphattiṃ gato.
tika-s0302t:1011_3: Yasmā jhānānaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ cittaṃ nissāya paccayo hotiyeva,
tika-s0302t:1011_11: Sithilamārabbhāti sithilaṃ vīriyārambhaṃ katvāti atthoti āha “sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ pavattetvā”ti.
tika-s0302t:1014_2: Atikkantarūpoti attano rūpasampattiyā rūpasobhāya atikkamitvā ṭhitarūpo,
tika-s0302t:1014_6: Chavivaṇṇasundaratāyāti chavivaṇṇassa ceva sarīrasaṇṭhānassa ca sobhanabhāvena.
tika-s0302t:1018_0: Guṇe āvajjetvāti attanā jānanakaniyāmena satthuno kāyaguṇe ca cārittaguṇe ca āvajjetvā manasi katvā.
tika-s0302t:1023_4: Sā pana dutavilambitakhalitavasena appasannalūkhatādidosarahitā hotīti āha “pura…pe…
tika-s0302t:1023_13: Tā hi cattāri saccāni paricchijja āpādenti paṭipādenti pavattenti.
tika-s0302t:1026_4: taggahaṇeneva vīriyanissitadhutaṅgassa ca samādāya vattanaṃ dīpitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:1030_0: Vācāya sannitodakenāti vacanasaṅkhātena samantato niccaṃ katvā upatudanato sannitudakena.
tika-s0302t:1031_7: Tatthevāti tassāyeva sālāya dvāraṃ nissāya dvārasamīpe.
tika-s0302t:1031_14: Pabujjhiṃsūti niddāya pabujjhiṃsu pakatiyā pabujjhanavelāya upagatattā.
tika-s0302t:1033_2: yaṃ tena tāpasena pāramitāparibhāvanasamiddhāhi nānāvihārasamāpattiparipūritāhi sīladiṭṭhisampadādīhi
tika-s0302t:1033_3: susaṅkhatasantāne mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte bodhisatte ariyūpavādakammaṃ abhisapasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavacanaṃ
tika-s0302t:1033_5: taṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpeti,
tika-s0302t:1033_7: khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajjati ahosikammabhāvato.
tika-s0302t:1033_11: Tena hi ubbāḷhā manussā bodhisattassa santike tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ.
tika-s0302t:1033_12: Sopi ca mahāsattassa guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesi.
tika-s0302t:1033_13: Yaṃ panassa matthake mattikāpiṇḍassa ṭhapanaṃ tassa sattadhā phālanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0302t:1033_15: Aññathā hi ime pabbajitā samānā cittassa vasaṃ vattanti,
tika-s0302t:1033_16: na pana cittamattano vase vattāpentīti mahāsattampi tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ,
tika-s0302t:1036_6: Sabbā khandhāyatanadhātuyo cāti iminā upādiṇṇānampi anupādiṇṇānampi dvidhā pavattalokiyadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ avisesetvā vuttattā.
tika-s0302t:1036_10: Tadeva sabbanti heṭṭhā tīsupi padesu idha sabbaggahaṇena gahitaṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ.
tika-s0302t:1036_12: Taṇhā khīyati etthāti taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuttaṃ.
tika-s0302t:1036_13: Tamahanti taṃ uttamapuggalaṃ ekavihāriṃ brūmi taṇhādutiyassa abhāvato.
tika-s0302t:1036_14: Ettha ca pariññāpahānābhisamayakathanena itarampi abhisamayaṃ atthato kathitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0302t:1039_5: Kiñci sāsananti apubbapavattidīpakaṃ kiñci vacananti pucchi.
tika-s0302t:1039_6: Pīti uppajji yathā taṃ suciraṃ katābhinīhāratāya paripakkañāṇassa.
tika-s0302t:1039_9: Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhato saṃsāradukkhato ca apatante dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-s0302t:1040_0: Navasatasahassāni adāsi devī. Tumheti rājiniṃ gāravena bahuvacanena vadati. Rāgoti anugacchantarāgo.
tika-s0302t:1041_1: Kammakilesehi pajātattā pajāti pajāsaddo janitasaddena samānatthoti āha – “janite,
tika-s0302t:1041_4: Tattha hi vipassanāñāṇamanomayiddhīhi saha cha abhiññā “aṭṭha vijjā”ti āgatā.
tika-s0302t:1041_8: Jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāhitena cittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnoti āha –
tika-s0302t:1042_0: “Maṅgalaṃ bhagavā buddho, dhammo saṅgho ca maṅgalaṃ;
tika-s0302t:1044_0: Pūjaṃ kāretvā ekaṃ agārikadhammakathikaṃ upāsakaṃ āha.
tika-s0302t:1044_1: Ettha ca “jhāyī tapatī”ti iminā ārammaṇūpanijjhānānaṃ gahitattā dhammaratanaṃ gahitameva.
tika-s0302t:1047_3: Sammā cirarattaṃ cirakālaṃ sameti etesaṃ atthīti cirarattaṃsametikā.
tika-s0302t:1047_6: Ayaṃ sāsanadhammo ajjhāsayato payogato ca sammā saṃsandati sameti,
tika-s0302t:1047_7: tasmā majjhe bhinnaṃ viya samameva na visadisaṃ.
tika-s0302t:1047_8: Kiñca tato eva buddhena bhagavatā paveditadhammavinaye etesaṃ paṭipattisāsanadhammo sobhati virocatīti attho.
tika-s0302t:1047_9: Ariyappavediteti ariyena sammāsambuddhena sammadeva pakāsite ariyadhamme.
tika-s0302t:1047_10: Sammadeva samucchedapaṭippassaddhivinayānaṃ vasena suṭṭhu vinītā sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhānaṃ vūpasamena.
